in,the,city,yoren,had,loaded,up,the,wagons,with,salt,fish,hard,bread,lard,turnips,sacks,of,beans,and,barley,and,wheels,of,yellow,cheese,but,every,bite,of,it,had,been,eaten,[END]
forced,to,live,off,the,land,yoren,turned,to,koss,and,kurz,who,d,been,taken,as,poachers,[END]
he,would,send,them,ahead,of,the,column,into,the,woods,and,come,dusk,they,would,be,back,with,a,deer,slung,between,them,on,a,pole,or,a,brace,of,quail,swinging,from,their,belts,[END]
the,younger,boys,would,be,set,to,picking,blackberries,along,the,road,or,climbing,fences,to,fill,a,sack,with,apples,if,they,happened,upon,an,orchard,[END]
arya,was,a,skilled,climber,and,a,fast,picker,and,she,liked,to,go,off,by,herself,[END]
one,day,she,came,across,a,rabbit,purely,by,happenstance,[END]
it,was,brown,and,fat,with,long,ears,and,a,twitchy,nose,[END]

lumpyface,lumpyhead,rabbitkiller,[END]
outside,a,holdfast,called,briarwhite,some,fieldhands,surrounded,them,in,a,cornfield,demanding,coin,for,the,ears,they,d,taken,[END]

time,was,a,man,in,black,was,feasted,from,dorne,to,winterfell,and,even,high,lords,called,it,an,honor,to,shelter,him,under,their,roofs,he,said,bitterly,[END]

their,beauty,will,make,them,more,pleasing,to,r,hllor,melisandre,said,when,she,told,stannis,to,pull,them,down,and,drag,them,out,the,castle,gates,[END]

that,at,least,was,as,he,remembered,the,ancient,stones,slick,with,spray,and,spotted,by,lichen,the,sea,foaming,under,their,feet,like,some,great,wild,beast,the,salt,wind,clutching,at,their,clothes,[END]

instead,the,old,woman,led,him,to,the,bloody,keep,[END]
the,halls,here,were,larger,and,better,furnished,if,no,less,cold,nor,damp,[END]
theon,was,given,a,suite,of,chilly,rooms,with,ceilings,so,high,that,they,were,lost,in,gloom,[END]
he,might,have,been,more,impressed,if,he,had,not,known,that,these,were,the,very,chambers,that,had,given,the,bloody,keep,its,name,[END]
a,thousand,years,before,the,sons,of,the,river,king,had,been,slaughtered,here,hacked,to,bits,in,their,beds,so,that,pieces,of,their,bodies,might,be,sent,back,to,their,father,on,the,mainland,[END]
but,greyjoys,were,not,murdered,in,pyke,except,once,in,a,great,while,by,their,brothers,and,his,brothers,were,both,dead,[END]
it,was,not,fear,of,ghosts,that,made,him,glance,about,with,distaste,[END]
the,wall,hangings,were,green,with,mildew,the,mattress,musty-smelling,and,sagging,the,rushes,old,and,brittle,[END]
years,had,come,and,gone,since,these,chambers,had,last,been,opened,[END]
the,damp,went,bone,deep,[END]
i,ll,have,a,basin,of,hot,water,and,a,fire,in,this,hearth,he,told,the,crone,[END]
see,that,they,light,braziers,in,the,other,rooms,to,drive,out,some,of,the,chill,[END]
and,gods,be,good,get,someone,in,here,at,once,to,change,these,rushes,[END]
yes,m,lord,[END]
as,you,command,she,fled,[END]
after,some,time,they,brought,the,hot,water,he,had,asked,for,[END]
it,was,only,tepid,and,soon,cold,and,seawater,in,the,bargain,but,it,served,to,wash,the,dust,of,the,long,ride,from,his,face,and,hair,and,hands,[END]
while,two,thralls,lit,his,braziers,theon,stripped,off,his,travel-stained,clothing,and,dressed,to,meet,his,father,[END]
he,chose,boots,of,supple,black,leather,soft,lambswool,breeches,of,silvery-grey,a,black,velvet,doublet,with,the,golden,kraken,of,the,greyjoys,embroidered,on,the,breast,[END]
around,his,throat,he,fastened,a,slender,gold,chain,around,his,waist,a,belt,of,bleached,white,leather,[END]
he,hung,a,dirk,at,one,hip,and,a,longsword,at,the,other,in,scabbards,striped,black-and-gold,[END]
drawing,the,dirk,he,tested,its,edge,with,his,thumb,pulled,a,whetstone,from,his,belt,pouch,and,gave,it,a,few,licks,[END]
he,prided,himself,on,keeping,his,weapons,sharp,[END]
when,i,return,i,shall,expect,a,warm,room,and,clean,rushes,he,warned,the,thralls,as,he,drew,on,a,pair,of,black,gloves,the,silk,decorated,with,a,delicate,scrollwork,tracery,in,golden,thread,[END]
theon,returned,to,the,great,keep,through,a,covered,stone,walkway,the,echoes,of,his,footsteps,mingling,with,the,ceaseless,rumble,of,the,sea,below,[END]
to,get,to,the,sea,tower,on,its,crooked,pillar,he,had,to,cross,three,further,bridges,each,narrower,than,the,one,before,[END]
the,last,was,made,of,rope,and,wood,and,the,wet,salt,wind,made,it,sway,underfoot,like,a,living,thing,[END]
theon,s,heart,was,in,his,mouth,by,the,time,he,was,halfway,across,[END]

boys,believe,nothing,can,hurt,them,his,doubt,whispered,[END]
grown,men,know,better,[END]

this,was,no,kindly,country,[END]
they,left,a,trail,of,dead,and,dying,horses,behind,them,as,they,went,for,pono,jhaqo,and,the,others,had,seized,the,best,of,drogo,s,herds,leaving,to,dany,the,old,and,the,scrawny,the,sickly,and,the,lame,the,broken,animals,and,the,ill-tempered,[END]
it,was,the,same,with,the,people,[END]
they,are,not,strong,she,told,herself,so,i,must,be,their,strength,[END]
i,must,show,no,fear,no,weakness,no,doubt,[END]
however,frightened,my,heart,when,they,look,upon,my,face,they,must,see,only,drogo,s,queen,[END]

a,toothless,oldster,with,cloudy,blue,eyes,he,fell,exhausted,from,his,saddle,and,could,not,rise,again,[END]

blood,flies,swarmed,about,his,corpse,and,carried,his,ill,luck,to,the,living,[END]

no,man,should,live,longer,than,his,teeth,the,others,agreed,[END]

her,mother,s,anguished,wailing,lasted,all,day,but,there,was,nothing,to,be,done,[END]
the,child,had,been,too,young,to,ride,poor,thing,[END]
not,for,her,the,endless,black,grasses,of,the,night,lands,she,must,be,born,again,[END]
there,was,little,forage,in,the,red,waste,and,less,water,[END]
it,was,a,sere,and,desolate,land,of,low,hills,and,barren,windswept,plains,[END]
the,rivers,they,crossed,were,dry,as,dead,men,s,bones,[END]
their,mounts,subsisted,on,the,tough,brown,devilgrass,that,grew,in,clumps,at,the,base,of,rocks,and,dead,trees,[END]
dany,sent,outriders,ranging,ahead,of,the,column,but,they,found,neither,wells,nor,springs,only,bitter,pools,shallow,and,stagnant,shrinking,in,the,hot,sun,[END]
the,deeper,they,rode,into,the,waste,the,smaller,the,pools,became,while,the,distance,between,them,grew,[END]

wine,gave,out,first,and,soon,thereafter,the,clotted,mare,s,milk,the,horselords,loved,better,than,mead,[END]

their,hunters,found,no,game,and,only,the,flesh,of,their,dead,horses,filled,their,bellies,[END]
death,followed,death,[END]
weak,children,wrinkled,old,women,the,sick,and,the,stupid,and,the,heedless,the,cruel,land,claimed,them,all,[END]

dany,hungered,and,thirsted,with,the,rest,of,them,[END]
the,milk,in,her,breasts,dried,up,her,nipples,cracked,and,bled,and,the,flesh,fell,away,from,her,day,by,day,until,she,was,lean,and,hard,as,a,stick,yet,it,was,her,dragons,she,feared,for,[END]
her,father,had,been,slain,before,she,was,born,and,her,splendid,brother,rhaegar,as,well,[END]
her,mother,had,died,bringing,her,into,the,world,while,the,storm,screamed,outside,[END]
gentle,ser,willem,darry,who,must,have,loved,her,after,a,fashion,had,been,taken,by,a,wasting,sickness,when,she,was,very,young,[END]
her,brother,viserys,khal,drogo,who,was,her,sun-and-stars,even,her,unborn,son,the,gods,had,claimed,them,all,[END]
they,will,not,have,my,dragons,dany,vowed,[END]
they,will,not,[END]
the,dragons,were,no,larger,than,the,scrawny,cats,she,had,once,seen,skulking,along,the,walls,of,magister,illyrio,s,estate,in,pentos,[END]
until,they,unfolded,their,wings,[END]
their,span,was,three,times,their,length,each,wing,a,delicate,fan,of,translucent,skin,gorgeously,colored,stretched,taut,between,long,thin,bones,[END]
when,you,looked,hard,you,could,see,that,most,of,their,body,was,neck,tail,and,wing,[END]
such,little,things,she,thought,as,she,fed,them,by,hand,[END]
or,rather,tried,to,feed,them,for,the,dragons,would,not,eat,[END]
they,would,hiss,and,spit,at,each,bloody,morsel,of,horsemeat,steam,rising,from,their,nostrils,yet,they,would,not,take,the,food,[END]
until,dany,recalled,something,viserys,had,told,her,when,they,were,children,[END]
only,dragons,and,men,eat,cooked,meat,he,had,said,[END]
when,she,had,her,handmaids,char,the,horsemeat,black,the,dragons,ripped,at,it,eagerly,their,heads,striking,like,snakes,[END]
so,long,as,the,meat,was,seared,they,gulped,down,several,times,their,own,weight,every,day,and,at,last,began,to,grow,larger,and,stronger,[END]
dany,marveled,at,the,smoothness,of,their,scales,and,the,heat,that,poured,off,them,so,palpable,that,on,cold,nights,their,whole,bodies,seemed,to,steam,[END]
each,evenfall,as,the,khalasar,set,out,she,would,choose,a,dragon,to,ride,upon,her,shoulder,[END]
irri,and,jhiqui,carried,the,others,in,a,cage,of,woven,wood,slung,between,their,mounts,and,rode,close,behind,her,so,dany,was,never,out,of,their,sight,[END]
it,was,the,only,way,to,keep,them,quiescent,[END]
aegon,s,dragons,were,named,for,the,gods,of,old,valyria,she,told,her,bloodriders,one,morning,after,a,long,night,s,journey,[END]
visenya,s,dragon,was,vhagar,rhaenys,had,meraxes,and,aegon,rode,balerion,the,black,dread,[END]
it,was,said,that,vhagar,s,breath,was,so,hot,that,it,could,melt,a,knight,s,armor,and,cook,the,man,inside,that,meraxes,swallowed,horses,whole,and,balerion,[END]
his,fire,was,as,black,as,his,scales,his,wings,so,vast,that,whole,towns,were,swallowed,up,in,their,shadow,when,he,passed,overhead,[END]
the,dothraki,looked,at,her,hatchlings,uneasily,[END]
the,largest,of,her,three,was,shiny,black,his,scales,slashed,with,streaks,of,vivid,scarlet,to,match,his,wings,and,horns,[END]
khaleesi,aggo,murmured,there,sits,balerion,come,again,[END]
it,may,be,as,you,say,blood,of,my,blood,dany,replied,gravely,but,he,shall,have,a,new,name,for,this,new,life,[END]
i,would,name,them,all,for,those,the,gods,have,taken,[END]
the,green,one,shall,be,rhaegal,for,my,valiant,brother,who,died,on,the,green,banks,of,the,trident,[END]
the,cream-and-gold,i,call,viserion,[END]
viserys,was,cruel,and,weak,and,frightened,yet,he,was,my,brother,still,[END]
his,dragon,will,do,what,he,could,not,[END]
and,the,black,beast,asked,ser,jorah,mormont,[END]
the,black,she,said,is,drogon,[END]

around,them,the,land,turned,ever,more,desolate,[END]
even,devilgrass,grew,scant,horses,dropped,in,their,tracks,leaving,so,few,that,some,of,her,people,must,trudge,along,on,foot,[END]
doreah,took,a,fever,and,grew,worse,with,every,league,they,crossed,[END]
her,lips,and,hands,broke,with,blood,blisters,her,hair,came,out,in,clumps,and,one,evenfall,she,lacked,the,strength,to,mount,her,horse,[END]

she,gave,doreah,water,from,her,own,skin,cooled,her,brow,with,a,damp,cloth,and,held,her,hand,until,she,died,shivering,[END]
only,then,would,she,permit,the,khalasar,to,press,on,[END]
they,saw,no,sign,of,other,travelers,[END]

are,we,lost,she,asked,him,[END]

inside,was,a,maze,of,narrow,crooked,alleys,[END]

ghosts,irri,muttered,[END]
terrible,ghosts,[END]

by,rights,i,should,have,gotten,a,contemptuous,refusal,but,lord,leyton,accepted,my,offer,[END]

even,i,was,given,more,happiness,than,that,with,drogo,who,was,my,sun-and-stars,[END]

it,was,too,cold,too,damp,too,far,away,my,castle,no,more,than,a,wooden,longhall,[END]

even,meals,became,a,trial,[END]
my,cook,knew,little,beyond,his,roasts,and,stews,and,lynesse,soon,lost,her,taste,for,fish,and,venison,[END]
i,lived,for,her,smiles,so,i,sent,all,the,way,to,oldtown,for,a,new,cook,and,brought,a,harper,from,lannisport,[END]
goldsmiths,jewelers,dressmakers,whatever,she,wanted,i,found,for,her,but,it,was,never,enough,[END]
bear,island,is,rich,in,bears,and,trees,and,poor,in,aught,else,[END]
i,built,a,fine,ship,for,her,and,we,sailed,to,lannisport,and,oldtown,for,festivals,and,fairs,and,once,even,to,braavos,where,i,borrowed,heavily,from,the,moneylenders,[END]
it,was,as,a,tourney,champion,that,i,had,won,her,hand,and,heart,so,i,entered,other,tourneys,for,her,sake,but,the,magic,was,gone,[END]
i,never,distinguished,myself,again,and,each,defeat,meant,the,loss,of,another,charger,and,another,suit,of,jousting,armor,which,must,needs,be,ransomed,or,replaced,[END]
the,cost,could,not,be,borne,[END]
finally,i,insisted,we,return,home,but,there,matters,soon,grew,even,worse,than,before,[END]
i,could,no,longer,pay,the,cook,and,the,harper,and,lynesse,grew,wild,when,i,spoke,of,pawning,her,jewels,[END]
the,rest,[END]
i,did,things,it,shames,me,to,speak,of,[END]
for,gold,[END]
so,lynesse,might,keep,her,jewels,her,harper,and,her,cook,[END]
in,the,end,it,cost,me,all,[END]
when,i,heard,that,eddard,stark,was,coming,to,bear,island,i,was,so,lost,to,honor,that,rather,than,stay,and,face,his,judgment,i,took,her,with,me,into,exile,[END]
nothing,mattered,but,our,love,i,told,myself,[END]
we,fled,to,lys,where,i,sold,my,ship,for,gold,to,keep,us,[END]
his,voice,was,thick,with,grief,and,dany,was,reluctant,to,press,him,any,further,yet,she,had,to,know,how,it,ended,[END]
did,she,die,there,she,asked,him,gently,[END]
only,to,me,he,said,[END]
in,half,a,year,my,gold,was,gone,and,i,was,obliged,to,take,service,as,a,sellsword,[END]
while,i,was,fighting,braavosi,on,the,rhoyne,lynesse,moved,into,the,manse,of,a,merchant,prince,named,tregar,ormollen,[END]
they,say,she,is,his,chief,concubine,now,and,even,his,wife,goes,in,fear,of,her,[END]
dany,was,horrified,[END]
do,you,hate,her,[END]
almost,as,much,as,i,love,her,ser,jorah,answered,[END]
pray,excuse,me,my,queen,[END]

the,world,is,strange,jon,thought,[END]
two,hundred,brave,men,had,left,the,wall,and,the,only,one,who,was,not,growing,more,fearful,was,sam,the,self-confessed,coward,[END]
we,ll,make,a,ranger,of,you,yet,he,joked,[END]
next,thing,you,ll,want,to,be,an,outrider,like,grenn,[END]

the,column,was,well,under,way,so,he,swung,wide,around,the,village,to,avoid,the,worst,of,the,congestion,[END]
he,had,seen,enough,of,whitetree,[END]
ghost,emerged,from,the,undergrowth,so,suddenly,that,the,garron,shied,and,reared,[END]
the,white,wolf,hunted,well,away,from,the,line,of,march,but,he,was,not,having,much,better,fortune,than,the,foragers,smallwood,sent,out,after,game,[END]
the,woods,were,as,empty,as,the,villages,dywen,had,told,him,one,night,around,the,fire,[END]

is,the,bird,away,the,old,bear,asked,[END]

arya,[END]

i,was,talking,not,bothering,hot,pie,went,off,and,let,her,alone,and,arya,curled,up,on,her,pallet,[END]

i,wish,she,d,just,be,quiet,[END]

she,dreamed,a,wolf,was,howling,and,the,sound,was,so,terrible,that,it,woke,her,at,once,[END]
arya,sat,up,on,her,pallet,with,her,heart,thumping,[END]
hot,pie,wake,up,she,scrambled,to,her,feet,[END]

let,them,howl,gerren,said,they,re,out,there,we,re,in,here,woth,agreed,[END]
never,saw,no,wolf,could,storm,a,holdfast,hot,pie,was,saying,i,never,heard,nothing,[END]
it,was,a,wolf,she,shouted,at,them,as,she,yanked,on,her,second,boot,[END]
something,s,wrong,someone,s,coming,get,up,[END]
before,they,could,hoot,her,down,again,the,sound,came,shuddering,through,the,night,only,it,was,no,wolf,this,time,it,was,kurz,blowing,his,hunting,horn,sounding,danger,[END]
in,a,heartbeat,all,of,them,were,pulling,on,clothes,and,snatching,for,whatever,weapons,they,owned,[END]
arya,ran,for,the,gate,as,the,horn,sounded,again,[END]

boy,[END]

a,man,can,fight,[END]
boy,she,ignored,him,and,plunged,on,[END]
by,then,she,could,hear,horses,and,shouts,beyond,the,wall,[END]
she,scrambled,up,onto,the,catwalk,[END]
the,parapets,were,a,bit,too,high,and,arya,a,bit,too,short,she,had,to,wedge,her,toes,into,the,holes,between,the,stones,to,see,over,[END]
for,a,moment,she,thought,the,town,was,full,of,lantern,bugs,[END]
then,she,realized,they,were,men,with,torches,galloping,between,the,houses,[END]
she,saw,a,roof,go,up,flames,licking,at,the,belly,of,the,night,with,hot,orange,tongues,as,the,thatch,caught,[END]

how,many,[END]

one,carried,a,banner,on,a,tall,lance,[END]
she,thought,it,was,red,but,it,was,hard,to,tell,in,the,night,with,the,fires,roaring,all,around,[END]
everything,seemed,red,or,black,or,orange,[END]
the,fire,leapt,from,one,house,to,another,[END]

she,chewed,her,lip,and,darted,through,the,doors,crouched,low,where,the,smoke,wasn,t,quite,so,thick,[END]

she,could,smell,the,stench,of,burning,hair,[END]
the,roof,was,gone,up,too,and,things,were,falling,down,pieces,of,flaming,wood,and,bits,of,straw,and,hay,[END]
arya,put,a,hand,over,her,mouth,and,nose,[END]
she,couldn,t,see,the,wagon,for,the,smoke,but,she,could,still,hear,biter,screaming,[END]
she,crawled,toward,the,sound,[END]
and,then,a,wheel,was,looming,over,her,[END]

jaqen,saw,her,but,it,was,too,hard,to,breathe,let,alone,talk,[END]
she,threw,the,axe,into,the,wagon,[END]
rorge,caught,it,and,lifted,it,over,his,head,rivers,of,sooty,sweat,pouring,down,his,noseless,face,[END]
arya,was,running,coughing,[END]
she,heard,the,steel,crash,through,the,old,wood,and,again,again,[END]
an,instant,later,came,a,crack,as,loud,as,thunder,and,the,bottom,of,the,wagon,came,ripping,loose,in,an,explosion,of,splinters,[END]
arya,rolled,headfirst,into,the,tunnel,and,dropped,five,feet,[END]
she,got,dirt,in,her,mouth,but,she,didn,t,care,the,taste,was,fine,the,taste,was,mud,and,water,and,worms,and,life,[END]
under,the,earth,the,air,was,cool,and,dark,[END]
above,was,nothing,but,blood,and,roaring,red,and,choking,smoke,and,the,screams,of,dying,horses,[END]
she,moved,her,belt,around,so,needle,would,not,be,in,her,way,and,began,to,crawl,[END]
a,dozen,feet,down,the,tunnel,she,heard,the,sound,like,the,roar,of,some,monstrous,beast,and,a,cloud,of,hot,smoke,and,black,dust,came,billowing,up,behind,her,smelling,of,hell,[END]
arya,held,her,breath,and,kissed,the,mud,on,the,floor,of,the,tunnel,and,cried,[END]
for,whom,she,could,not,say,[END]
tyrion,[END]
the,queen,was,not,disposed,to,wait,on,varys,[END]
treason,is,vile,enough,she,declared,furiously,but,this,is,barefaced,naked,villainy,and,i,do,not,need,that,mincing,eunuch,to,tell,me,what,must,be,done,with,villains,[END]
tyrion,took,the,letters,from,his,sister,s,hand,and,compared,them,side,by,side,[END]
there,were,two,copies,the,words,exactly,alike,though,they,had,been,written,by,different,hands,[END]
maester,frenken,received,the,first,missive,at,castle,stokeworth,grand,maester,pycelle,explained,[END]

how,much,he,had,overheard,bran,could,not,say,[END]

these,threats,are,unseemly,and,i,ll,hear,no,more,of,them,[END]

the,walders,he,began,[END]

i,only,wanted,[END]

bran,ran,a,hand,across,the,rough,wood,of,the,table,and,begged,lord,wyman,s,pardons,for,being,late,[END]

he,liked,to,spend,time,with,his,wolf,every,day,when,ser,rodrik,and,the,maester,allowed,it,[END]
no,sooner,had,hodor,entered,the,godswood,than,summer,emerged,from,under,an,oak,almost,as,if,he,had,known,they,were,coming,[END]

shaggy,he,called,[END]

to,me,but,rickon,s,wolf,vanished,as,swiftly,as,he,d,appeared,[END]

you,ve,got,a,lot,of,scars,[END]

who,[END]

that,it,s,a,fool,boy,who,mocks,a,giant,and,a,mad,world,when,a,cripple,has,to,defend,him,[END]
hodor,never,knew,they,were,mocking,him,bran,said,[END]
anyhow,he,never,fights,he,remembered,once,when,he,was,little,going,to,the,market,square,with,his,mother,and,septa,mordane,[END]
they,brought,hodor,to,carry,for,them,but,he,had,wandered,away,and,when,they,found,him,some,boys,had,him,backed,into,an,alley,poking,him,with,sticks,[END]
hodor,he,kept,shouting,cringing,and,covering,himself,but,he,had,never,raised,a,hand,against,his,tormentors,[END]
septon,chayle,says,he,has,a,gentle,spirit,[END]
aye,she,said,and,hands,strong,enough,to,twist,a,man,s,head,off,his,shoulders,if,he,takes,a,mind,to,[END]
all,the,same,he,better,watch,his,back,around,that,walder,[END]
him,and,you,both,[END]
the,big,one,they,call,little,it,comes,to,me,he,s,well,named,[END]
big,outside,little,inside,and,mean,down,to,the,bones,[END]
he,d,never,dare,hurt,me,[END]
he,s,scared,of,summer,no,matter,what,he,says,[END]
then,might,be,he,s,not,so,stupid,as,he,seems,osha,was,always,wary,around,the,direwolves,[END]
the,day,she,was,taken,summer,and,grey,wind,between,them,had,torn,three,wildlings,to,bloody,pieces,[END]
or,might,be,he,is,[END]
and,that,tastes,of,trouble,too,she,tied,up,her,hair,[END]
you,have,more,of,them,wolf,dreams,[END]
no,he,did,not,like,to,talk,about,the,dreams,[END]
a,prince,should,lie,better,than,that,osha,laughed,[END]
well,your,dreams,are,your,business,[END]
mine,s,in,the,kitchens,and,i,d,best,be,getting,back,before,gage,starts,to,shouting,and,waving,that,big,wooden,spoon,of,his,[END]
by,your,leave,my,prince,[END]
she,should,never,have,talked,about,the,wolf,dreams,bran,thought,as,hodor,carried,him,up,the,steps,to,his,bedchamber,[END]
he,fought,against,sleep,as,long,as,he,could,but,in,the,end,it,took,him,as,it,always,did,[END]
on,this,night,he,dreamed,of,the,weirwood,[END]
it,was,looking,at,him,with,its,deep,red,eyes,calling,to,him,with,its,twisted,wooden,mouth,and,from,its,pale,branches,the,three-eyed,crow,came,flapping,pecking,at,his,face,and,crying,his,name,in,a,voice,as,sharp,as,swords,[END]
the,blast,of,horns,woke,him,[END]
bran,pushed,himself,onto,his,side,grateful,for,the,reprieve,[END]
he,heard,horses,and,boisterous,shouting,[END]
more,guests,have,come,and,half-drunk,by,the,noise,of,them,[END]
grasping,his,bars,he,pulled,himself,from,the,bed,and,over,to,the,window,seat,[END]
on,their,banner,was,a,giant,in,shattered,chains,that,told,him,that,these,were,umber,men,down,from,the,northlands,beyond,the,last,river,[END]
the,next,day,two,of,them,came,together,to,audience,the,greatjon,s,uncles,blustery,men,in,the,winter,of,their,days,with,beards,as,white,as,the,bearskin,cloaks,they,wore,[END]
a,crow,had,once,taken,mors,for,dead,and,pecked,out,his,eye,so,he,wore,a,chunk,of,dragonglass,in,its,stead,[END]

no,sooner,had,they,been,seated,than,mors,asked,for,leave,to,wed,lady,hornwood,[END]

who,better,to,protect,the,widow,s,lands,than,an,umber,and,what,umber,better,than,me,[END]

arya,had,eaten,a,bug,once,when,she,was,little,just,to,make,sansa,screech,so,she,hadn,t,been,afraid,to,eat,another,[END]

it,tasted,awful,[END]
she,wished,the,poacher,hadn,t,died,[END]
he,d,known,more,about,the,woods,than,all,the,rest,of,them,together,but,he,d,taken,an,arrow,through,the,shoulder,pulling,in,the,ladder,at,the,towerhouse,[END]
tarber,had,packed,it,with,mud,and,moss,from,the,lake,and,for,a,day,or,two,kurz,swore,the,wound,was,nothing,even,though,the,flesh,of,his,throat,was,turning,dark,while,angry,red,welts,crept,up,his,jaw,and,down,his,chest,[END]
then,one,morning,he,couldn,t,find,the,strength,to,get,up,and,by,the,next,he,was,dead,[END]
they,buried,him,under,a,mound,of,stones,and,cutjack,had,claimed,his,sword,and,hunting,horn,while,tarber,helped,himself,to,bow,and,boots,and,knife,[END]
they,d,taken,it,all,when,they,left,[END]

near,all,the,chivalry,of,the,south,had,come,to,renly,s,call,it,seemed,[END]

the,great,hall,of,lord,caswell,s,keep,was,great,only,by,courtesy,yet,room,was,found,on,the,crowded,benches,for,catelyn,s,men,amidst,renly,s,own,knights,[END]

ser,jon,made,jests,while,lord,mathis,inquired,politely,after,the,health,of,her,father,brother,and,children,[END]
brienne,of,tarth,had,been,seated,at,the,far,end,of,the,high,table,[END]
she,did,not,gown,herself,as,a,lady,but,chose,a,knight,s,finery,instead,a,velvet,doublet,quartered,rose-and-azure,breeches,and,boots,and,a,fine-tooled,swordbelt,her,new,rainbow,cloak,flowing,down,her,back,[END]
no,garb,could,disguise,her,plainness,though,the,huge,freckled,hands,the,wide,flat,face,the,thrust,of,her,teeth,[END]
out,of,armor,her,body,seemed,ungainly,broad,of,hip,and,thick,of,limb,with,hunched,muscular,shoulders,but,no,bosom,to,speak,of,[END]
and,it,was,clear,from,her,every,action,that,brienne,knew,it,and,suffered,for,it,[END]
she,spoke,only,in,answer,and,seldom,lifted,her,gaze,from,her,food,[END]
of,food,there,was,plenty,[END]
the,war,had,not,touched,the,fabled,bounty,of,highgarden,[END]
while,singers,sang,and,tumblers,tumbled,they,began,with,pears,poached,in,wine,and,went,on,to,tiny,savory,fish,rolled,in,salt,and,cooked,crisp,and,capons,stuffed,with,onions,and,mushrooms,[END]
there,were,great,loaves,of,brown,bread,mounds,of,turnips,and,sweetcorn,and,pease,immense,hams,and,roast,geese,and,trenchers,dripping,full,of,venison,stewed,with,beer,and,barley,[END]
for,the,sweet,lord,caswell,s,servants,brought,down,trays,of,pastries,from,his,castle,kitchens,cream,swans,and,spun-sugar,unicorns,lemon,cakes,in,the,shape,of,roses,spiced,honey,biscuits,and,blackberry,tarts,apple,crisps,and,wheels,of,buttery,cheese,[END]
the,rich,foods,made,catelyn,queasy,but,it,would,never,do,to,show,frailty,when,so,much,depended,on,her,strength,[END]
she,ate,sparingly,while,she,watched,this,man,who,would,be,king,[END]
renly,sat,with,his,young,bride,on,his,left,hand,and,her,brother,on,the,right,[END]
apart,from,the,white,linen,bandage,around,his,brow,ser,loras,seemed,none,the,worse,for,the,day,s,misadventures,[END]

when,not,glazed,his,eyes,were,lively,and,intelligent,his,hair,an,artless,tumble,of,brown,locks,that,many,a,maid,might,have,envied,[END]

on,his,way,back,jon,swung,wide,of,the,column,s,line,of,march,and,took,a,shorter,path,through,the,thick,of,the,wood,[END]

it,was,midafternoon,yet,the,forest,seemed,as,dark,as,dusk,[END]
jon,wove,a,path,between,rocks,and,puddles,past,great,oaks,grey-green,sentinels,and,black-barked,ironwoods,[END]
in,places,the,branches,wove,a,canopy,overhead,and,he,was,given,a,moment,s,respite,from,the,drumming,of,the,rain,against,his,head,[END]

ghost,he,called,out,[END]
ghost,to,me,[END]
but,it,was,dywen,who,emerged,from,the,greenery,forking,a,shaggy,grey,garron,with,grenn,ahorse,beside,him,[END]
the,old,bear,had,deployed,outriders,to,either,side,of,the,main,column,to,screen,their,march,and,warn,of,the,approach,of,any,enemies,and,even,there,he,took,no,chances,sending,the,men,out,in,pairs,[END]
ah,it,s,you,lord,snow,dywen,smiled,an,oaken,smile,his,teeth,were,carved,of,wood,and,fit,badly,[END]
thought,me,and,the,boy,had,us,one,o,them,others,to,deal,with,[END]

he,s,off,hunting,ghost,did,not,like,to,travel,with,the,column,but,he,would,not,be,far,[END]

aye,a,good,crop,of,mildew,dywen,said,[END]

with,me,ghost,jon,spurred,off,to,craster,s,keep,[END]
he,had,never,thought,to,find,a,stone,castle,on,the,far,side,of,the,wall,but,he,had,pictured,some,sort,of,motte-and-bailey,with,a,wooden,palisade,and,a,timber,tower,keep,[END]

hot,pie,went,in,with,the,rest,of,them,[END]
in,the,echoing,stone-and-timber,bathhouse,the,captives,were,stripped,and,made,to,scrub,and,scrape,themselves,raw,in,tubs,of,scalding,hot,water,[END]

once,she,even,overheard,maester,tothmure,s,serving,girl,confiding,to,her,brother,about,some,message,that,said,joffrey,was,a,bastard,and,not,the,rightful,king,at,all,[END]

it,smells,like,death,[END]

he,gave,his,stew,to,grenn,who,looked,in,need,of,an,extra,supper,to,warm,him,against,the,night,[END]
the,wind,was,blowing,briskly,when,he,left,[END]
by,morning,frost,would,cover,the,ground,and,the,tent,ropes,would,be,stiff,and,frozen,[END]

yes,dany,said,[END]
but,it,was,ships,and,soldiers,i,wanted,[END]
did,i,not,give,you,an,army,sweetest,of,women,[END]

the,armor,had,been,made,of,silver,and,gold,the,knights,of,jade,and,beryl,and,onyx,and,tourmaline,of,amber,and,opal,and,amethyst,each,as,tall,as,her,little,finger,[END]

and,my,bullocks,cannot,carry,me,across,the,water,i,why,are,we,stopping,the,oxen,had,slowed,notably,[END]

a,firemage,khaleesi,[END]

most,of,the,spectators,she,noticed,were,not,of,the,city,she,saw,sailors,off,trading,ships,merchants,come,by,caravan,dusty,men,out,of,the,red,waste,wandering,soldiers,craftsmen,slavers,[END]

the,mage,was,gesturing,urging,the,flames,higher,and,higher,with,broad,sweeps,of,his,arms,[END]

each,rung,he,touched,dissolved,behind,him,leaving,no,more,than,a,wisp,of,silver,smoke,[END]
when,he,reached,the,top,the,ladder,was,gone,and,so,was,he,[END]
a,fine,trick,announced,jhogo,with,admiration,[END]
no,trick,a,woman,said,in,the,common,tongue,[END]
dany,had,not,noticed,quaithe,in,the,crowd,yet,there,she,stood,eyes,wet,and,shiny,behind,the,implacable,red,lacquer,mask,[END]
what,mean,you,my,lady,[END]
half,a,year,gone,that,man,could,scarcely,wake,fire,from,dragonglass,[END]

he,could,walk,across,hot,coals,and,make,burning,roses,bloom,in,the,air,but,he,could,no,more,aspire,to,climb,the,fiery,ladder,than,a,common,fisherman,could,hope,to,catch,a,kraken,in,his,nets,[END]
dany,looked,uneasily,at,where,the,ladder,had,stood,[END]
even,the,smoke,was,gone,now,and,the,crowd,was,breaking,up,each,man,going,about,his,business,[END]

and,now,[END]

rakharo,snorted,contempt,through,his,drooping,black,mustachios,[END]

in,the,quiet,of,her,chambers,dany,stripped,off,her,finery,and,donned,a,loose,robe,of,purple,silk,[END]

they,are,growing,she,realized,as,she,watched,them,snap,and,squabble,over,the,blackened,flesh,[END]

the,pureborn,refused,you,[END]

each,day,i,am,more,convinced,of,that,than,the,day,before,[END]

he,tells,it,true,as,far,as,it,goes,but,there,s,one,thing,he,failed,to,mention,[END]

and,it,may,not,be,denied,[END]

where,then,[END]
east,he,said,[END]

i,know,illyrio,better,than,you,think,[END]

even,if,illyrio,is,the,friend,you,think,him,the,knight,said,stubbornly,he,is,not,powerful,enough,to,enthrone,you,by,himself,no,more,than,he,could,your,brother,[END]

the,girl,never,wept,[END]
young,as,she,was,myrcella,baratheon,was,a,princess,born,[END]
and,a,lannister,despite,her,name,tyrion,reminded,himself,as,much,jaime,s,blood,as,cersei,s,[END]
to,be,sure,her,smile,was,a,shade,tremulous,when,her,brothers,took,their,leave,of,her,on,the,deck,of,the,seaswift,but,the,girl,knew,the,proper,words,to,say,and,she,said,them,with,courage,and,dignity,[END]

it,made,tyrion,more,than,a,little,uneasy,to,detach,so,great,a,part,of,their,already,inadequate,fleet,depleted,as,it,was,by,the,loss,of,all,those,ships,that,had,sailed,with,lord,stannis,to,dragonstone,and,never,returned,but,cersei,would,hear,of,nothing,less,[END]
perhaps,she,was,wise,[END]

once,myrcella,was,safe,in,braavos,he,had,pledged,to,move,his,strength,to,the,high,passes,where,the,threat,might,make,some,of,the,marcher,lords,rethink,their,loyalties,and,give,stannis,pause,about,marching,north,[END]

i,should,think,on,that,[END]
he,cleared,his,throat,[END]
you,know,your,orders,captain,[END]

if,the,worst,happened,the,little,seaswift,ought,to,be,able,to,outrun,pursuit,[END]

once,myrcella,reached,braavos,she,ought,to,be,safe,[END]
he,was,sending,ser,arys,oakheart,as,her,sworn,shield,and,had,engaged,the,braavosi,to,bring,her,the,rest,of,the,way,to,sunspear,[END]

or,so,he,hoped,[END]
if,lord,stannis,knew,of,this,sailing,he,could,not,choose,a,better,time,to,send,his,fleet,against,us,[END]

at,last,report,the,baratheon,fleet,still,lay,off,storm,s,end,where,ser,cortnay,penrose,continued,to,defy,the,besiegers,in,dead,renly,s,name,[END]
meanwhile,tyrion,s,winch,towers,stood,three-quarters,complete,[END]
even,now,men,were,hoisting,heavy,blocks,of,stone,into,place,no,doubt,cursing,him,for,making,them,work,through,the,festivities,[END]
let,them,curse,[END]
another,fortnight,stannis,that,s,all,i,require,[END]
another,fortnight,and,it,will,be,done,[END]

he,hoped,the,gods,had,sharper,ears,[END]
the,high,septon,was,as,fat,as,a,house,and,more,pompous,and,long,of,wind,than,even,pycelle,[END]
enough,old,man,make,an,end,to,it,tyrion,thought,irritably,[END]
the,gods,have,better,things,to,do,than,listen,to,you,and,so,do,i,[END]
when,at,last,the,droning,and,mumbling,was,done,tyrion,took,his,farewell,of,the,captain,of,rob,s,hammer,[END]

i,ll,wager,they,d,love,to,snigger,[END]
no,one,dared,not,openly,though,he,heard,mutterings,mingled,with,the,creak,of,wood,and,rope,and,the,rush,of,the,river,around,the,pilings,[END]
they,do,not,love,me,he,thought,[END]
well,small,wonder,[END]
i,m,well,fed,and,ugly,and,they,are,starving,[END]

he,watched,her,charming,lancel,with,eyes,as,green,as,the,rope,of,emeralds,around,her,slim,white,throat,and,smiled,a,small,sly,smile,to,himself,[END]
i,know,your,secret,cersei,he,thought,[END]
his,sister,had,oft,called,upon,the,high,septon,of,late,to,seek,the,blessings,of,the,gods,in,their,coming,struggle,with,lord,stannis,[END]
or,so,she,would,have,him,believe,[END]
in,truth,after,a,brief,call,at,the,great,sept,of,baelor,cersei,would,don,a,plain,brown,traveler,s,cloak,and,steal,off,to,meet,a,certain,hedge,knight,with,the,unlikely,name,of,ser,osmund,kettleblack,and,his,equally,unsavory,brothers,osney,and,osfryd,[END]
lancel,had,told,him,all,about,them,[END]
cersei,meant,to,use,the,kettleblacks,to,buy,her,own,force,of,sellswords,[END]
well,let,her,enjoy,her,plots,[END]

guyard,the,green,yes,[END]

the,others,followed,[END]

god,old,man,thought,davos,[END]

ser,[END]

ser,cortnay,s,father,[END]

forgiven,[END]

robert,could,piss,in,a,cup,and,men,would,call,it,wine,but,i,offer,them,pure,cold,water,and,they,squint,in,suspicion,and,mutter,to,each,other,about,how,queer,it,tastes,stannis,ground,his,teeth,[END]

one,of,the,guards,relieved,melisandre,of,her,cumbersome,standard,driving,the,staff,deep,into,the,soft,ground,[END]

oh,to,be,sure,once,in,a,great,while,some,useful,notion,is,put,forth,[END]

lord,velaryon,will,urge,me,to,storm,the,castle,walls,at,first,light,grapnels,and,scaling,ladders,against,arrows,and,boiling,oil,[END]

estermont,will,favor,settling,down,to,starve,them,out,as,tyrell,and,redwyne,once,tried,with,me,[END]
that,might,take,a,year,but,old,mules,are,patient,[END]
and,lord,caron,and,the,others,who,like,to,kick,will,want,to,take,up,ser,cortnay,s,gauntlet,and,hazard,all,upon,a,single,combat,[END]

the,king,snorted,[END]

a,siege,would,take,too,long,single,combat,is,too,chancy,and,an,assault,would,cost,thousands,of,lives,with,no,certainty,of,success,[END]
and,there,is,no,need,[END]

it,is,said,about,the,camp,that,lord,tywin,lannister,rushes,west,to,rescue,lannisport,from,the,vengeance,of,the,northmen,[END]
you,have,a,passing,clever,father,devan,the,king,told,the,boy,standing,by,his,elbow,[END]
he,makes,me,wish,i,had,more,smugglers,in,my,service,[END]
and,fewer,lords,[END]
though,you,are,wrong,in,one,respect,davos,[END]
there,is,a,need,[END]
if,i,leave,storm,s,end,untaken,in,my,rear,it,will,be,said,i,was,defeated,here,[END]
and,that,i,cannot,permit,[END]
men,do,not,love,me,as,they,loved,my,brothers,[END]
they,follow,me,because,they,fear,me,[END]
and,defeat,is,death,to,fear,[END]
the,castle,must,fall,his,jaw,ground,side,to,side,[END]
aye,and,quickly,[END]
doran,martell,has,called,his,banners,and,fortified,the,mountain,passes,[END]
his,dornishmen,are,poised,to,sweep,down,onto,the,marches,[END]
and,highgarden,is,far,from,spent,[END]

i,sent,my,wife,s,brother,ser,errol,with,ser,parmen,crane,to,take,them,under,my,command,but,they,have,not,returned,[END]
i,fear,that,ser,loras,tyrell,reached,bitterbridge,before,my,envoys,and,took,that,host,for,his,own,[END]
all,the,more,reason,to,take,king,s,landing,as,soon,as,we,may,[END]
salladhor,saan,told,me,[END]
salladhor,saan,thinks,only,of,gold,stannis,exploded,[END]
his,head,is,full,of,dreams,of,the,treasure,he,fancies,lies,under,the,red,keep,so,let,us,hear,no,more,of,salladhor,saan,[END]
the,day,i,need,military,counsel,from,a,lysene,brigand,is,the,day,i,put,off,my,crown,and,take,the,black,the,king,made,a,fist,[END]
are,you,here,to,serve,me,smuggler,[END]
or,to,vex,me,with,arguments,[END]
i,am,yours,davos,said,[END]
then,hear,me,[END]
ser,cortnay,s,lieutenant,is,cousin,to,the,fossoways,[END]
lord,meadows,a,green,boy,of,twenty,[END]
should,some,ill,chance,strike,down,penrose,command,of,storm,s,end,would,pass,to,this,stripling,and,his,cousins,believe,he,would,accept,my,terms,and,yield,up,the,castle,[END]
i,remember,another,stripling,who,was,given,command,of,storm,s,end,[END]
he,could,not,have,been,much,more,than,twenty,[END]
lord,meadows,is,not,as,stonehead,stubborn,as,i,was,[END]
stubborn,or,craven,what,does,it,matter,[END]
ser,cortnay,penrose,seemed,hale,and,hearty,to,me,[END]

the,last,time,it,was,life,i,brought,to,storm,s,end,shaped,to,look,like,onions,[END]

then,they,were,past,engulfed,in,darkness,and,the,waters,smoothed,[END]
the,little,boat,slowed,and,swirled,[END]
the,sound,of,their,breathing,echoed,until,it,seemed,to,surround,them,[END]
davos,had,not,expected,the,blackness,[END]
the,last,time,torches,had,burned,all,along,the,tunnel,and,the,eyes,of,starving,men,had,peered,down,through,the,murder,holes,in,the,ceiling,[END]
the,portcullis,was,somewhere,ahead,he,knew,[END]
davos,used,the,oars,to,slow,them,and,they,drifted,against,it,almost,gently,[END]
this,is,as,far,as,we,go,unless,you,have,a,man,inside,to,lift,the,gate,for,us,his,whispers,scurried,across,the,lapping,water,like,a,line,of,mice,on,soft,pink,feet,[END]
have,we,passed,within,the,walls,[END]
yes,[END]
beneath,[END]

and,the,bars,are,too,closely,spaced,for,even,a,child,to,squeeze,through,[END]
there,was,no,answer,but,a,soft,rustling,[END]
and,then,a,light,bloomed,amidst,the,darkness,[END]

swollen,breasts,hung,heavy,against,her,chest,and,her,belly,bulged,as,if,near,to,bursting,[END]
gods,preserve,us,he,whispered,and,heard,her,answering,laugh,deep,and,throaty,[END]
her,eyes,were,hot,coals,and,the,sweat,that,dappled,her,skin,seemed,to,glow,with,a,light,of,its,own,[END]
melisandre,shone,[END]
panting,she,squatted,and,spread,her,legs,[END]
blood,ran,down,her,thighs,black,as,ink,[END]
her,cry,might,have,been,agony,or,ecstasy,or,both,[END]
and,davos,saw,the,crown,of,the,child,s,head,push,its,way,out,of,her,[END]
two,arms,wriggled,free,grasping,black,fingers,coiling,around,melisandre,s,straining,thighs,pushing,until,the,whole,of,the,shadow,slid,out,into,the,world,and,rose,taller,than,davos,tall,as,the,tunnel,towering,above,the,boat,[END]
he,had,only,an,instant,to,look,at,it,before,it,was,gone,twisting,between,the,bars,of,the,portcullis,and,racing,across,the,surface,of,the,water,but,that,instant,was,long,enough,[END]
he,knew,that,shadow,[END]
as,he,knew,the,man,who,d,cast,it,[END]
jon,[END]
the,call,came,drifting,through,the,black,of,night,[END]
jon,pushed,himself,onto,an,elbow,his,hand,reaching,for,longclaw,by,force,of,habit,as,the,camp,began,to,stir,[END]
the,horn,that,wakes,the,sleepers,he,thought,[END]
the,long,low,note,lingered,at,the,edge,of,hearing,[END]
the,sentries,at,the,ringwall,stood,still,in,their,footsteps,breath,frosting,and,heads,turned,toward,the,west,[END]
as,the,sound,of,the,horn,faded,even,the,wind,ceased,to,blow,[END]
men,rolled,from,their,blankets,and,reached,for,spears,and,swordbelts,moving,quietly,listening,[END]
a,horse,whickered,and,was,hushed,[END]
for,a,heartbeat,it,seemed,as,if,the,whole,forest,were,holding,its,breath,[END]
the,brothers,of,the,night,s,watch,waited,for,a,second,blast,praying,they,should,not,hear,it,fearing,that,they,would,[END]
when,the,silence,had,stretched,unbearably,long,and,the,men,knew,at,last,that,the,horn,would,not,wind,again,they,grinned,at,one,another,sheepishly,as,if,to,deny,that,they,had,been,anxious,[END]
jon,snow,fed,a,few,sticks,to,the,fire,buckled,on,his,swordbelt,pulled,on,his,boots,shook,the,dirt,and,dew,from,the,cloak,and,fastened,it,around,his,shoulders,[END]
the,flames,blazed,up,beside,him,welcome,heat,beating,against,his,face,as,he,dressed,[END]
he,could,hear,the,lord,commander,moving,inside,the,tent,[END]
after,a,moment,mormont,lifted,the,flap,[END]
one,blast,on,his,shoulder,his,raven,sat,fluffed,and,silent,looking,miserable,[END]
one,my,lord,jon,agreed,[END]
brothers,returning,[END]
mormont,moved,to,the,fire,[END]
the,halfhand,[END]
and,past,time,he,had,grown,more,restive,every,day,they,waited,much,longer,and,he,would,have,been,fit,to,whelp,cubs,[END]
see,that,there,s,hot,food,for,the,men,and,fodder,for,the,horses,[END]
i,ll,see,qhorin,at,once,[END]
i,ll,bring,him,my,lord,the,men,from,the,shadow,tower,had,been,expected,days,ago,[END]
when,they,had,not,appeared,the,brothers,had,begun,to,wonder,[END]
jon,had,heard,gloomy,mutterings,around,the,cookfire,and,not,just,from,dolorous,edd,[END]
ser,ottyn,wythers,was,for,retreating,to,castle,black,as,soon,as,possible,[END]
ser,mallador,locke,would,strike,for,the,shadow,tower,hoping,to,pick,up,qhorin,s,trail,and,learn,what,had,befallen,him,[END]
and,thoren,smallwood,wanted,to,push,on,into,the,mountains,[END]
mance,rayder,knows,he,must,battle,the,watch,thoren,had,declared,but,he,will,never,look,for,us,so,far,north,[END]
if,we,ride,up,the,milkwater,we,can,take,him,unawares,and,cut,his,host,to,ribbons,before,he,knows,we,are,on,him,[END]
the,numbers,would,be,greatly,against,us,ser,ottyn,had,objected,[END]
craster,said,he,was,gathering,a,great,host,[END]
many,thousands,[END]
without,qhorin,we,are,only,two,hundred,[END]
send,two,hundred,wolves,against,ten,thousand,sheep,ser,and,see,what,happens,said,smallwood,confidently,[END]
there,are,goats,among,these,sheep,thoren,warned,jarman,buckwell,[END]
aye,and,maybe,a,few,lions,[END]
rattleshirt,harma,the,dogshead,alfyn,crowkiller,[END]
i,know,them,as,well,as,you,do,buckwell,thoren,smallwood,snapped,back,[END]
and,i,mean,to,have,their,heads,every,one,[END]
these,are,wildlings,[END]
no,soldiers,[END]
a,few,hundred,heroes,drunk,most,like,amidst,a,great,horde,of,women,children,and,thralls,[END]
we,will,sweep,over,them,and,send,them,howling,back,to,their,hovels,[END]
they,had,argued,for,many,hours,and,reached,no,agreement,[END]
the,old,bear,was,too,stubborn,to,retreat,but,neither,would,he,rush,headlong,up,the,milkwater,seeking,battle,[END]
in,the,end,nothing,had,been,decided,but,to,wait,a,few,more,days,for,the,men,from,the,shadow,tower,and,talk,again,if,they,did,not,appear,[END]

a,strong,castle,and,well,garrisoned,but,his,grace,shall,have,it,if,i,must,kill,every,living,soul,within,to,make,it,so,he,hoped,his,grace,would,weigh,that,against,the,crimes,of,his,bastard,son,whom,ser,rodrik,cassel,had,put,to,death,[END]

and,he,heard,it,again,clink,and,scrape,[END]
it,brought,him,to,his,feet,[END]

he,howled,a,long,deep,shivery,cry,a,howl,to,wake,the,sleepers,but,the,piles,of,man-rock,were,dark,and,dead,[END]
a,still,wet,night,a,night,to,drive,men,into,their,holes,[END]
the,rain,had,stopped,but,the,men,still,hid,from,the,damp,huddled,by,the,fires,in,their,caves,of,piled,stone,[END]

he,d,returned,from,rosby,to,deliver,a,fresh,levy,of,spearmen,recruited,from,lord,gyles,s,estates,and,resume,his,command,of,the,city,watch,[END]

winterfell,is,yours,in,my,absence,[END]

they,assembled,by,the,hunter,s,gate,as,the,first,pale,rays,of,the,sun,brushed,the,top,of,the,bell,tower,their,breath,frosting,in,the,cold,morning,air,[END]
gelmarr,had,equipped,himself,with,a,longaxe,whose,reach,would,allow,him,to,strike,before,the,wolves,were,on,him,[END]
the,blade,was,heavy,enough,to,kill,with,a,single,blow,[END]
aggar,wore,steel,greaves,[END]
reek,arrived,carrying,a,boar,spear,and,an,overstuffed,washerwoman,s,sack,bulging,with,god,knows,what,[END]
theon,had,his,bow,he,needed,nothing,else,[END]
once,he,had,saved,bran,s,life,with,an,arrow,[END]
he,hoped,he,would,not,need,to,take,it,with,another,but,if,it,came,to,that,he,would,[END]
eleven,men,two,boys,and,a,dozen,dogs,crossed,the,moat,[END]
beyond,the,outer,wall,the,tracks,were,plain,to,read,in,the,soft,ground,the,pawprints,of,the,wolves,hodor,s,heavy,tread,the,shallower,marks,left,by,the,feet,of,the,two,reeds,[END]
once,under,the,trees,the,stony,ground,and,fallen,leaves,made,the,trail,harder,to,see,but,by,then,farlen,s,red,bitch,had,the,scent,[END]
the,rest,of,the,dogs,were,close,behind,the,hounds,sniffing,and,barking,a,pair,of,monstrous,mastiffs,bringing,up,the,rear,[END]

he,d,have,guessed,that,osha,might,run,south,to,ser,rodrik,but,the,trail,led,north,by,northwest,into,the,very,heart,of,the,wolfswood,[END]

it,is,better,to,be,seen,as,cruel,than,foolish,[END]

sentinels,and,soldier,pines,grew,thick,about,here,and,there,was,nothing,as,dark,and,gloomy,as,an,evergreen,forest,[END]
the,ground,was,uneven,and,the,fallen,needles,disguised,the,softness,of,the,turf,and,made,the,footing,treacherous,for,the,horses,so,they,had,to,go,slowly,[END]
not,as,slowly,as,a,man,carrying,a,cripple,though,or,a,bony,harridan,with,a,four-year-old,on,her,back,[END]
he,told,himself,to,be,patient,[END]
he,d,have,them,before,the,day,was,out,[END]

half,a,mile,ahead,and,two,thousand,feet,up,jon,judged,and,perfectly,placed,to,see,anything,moving,in,the,pass,below,[END]

if,he,knew,they,d,lit,a,fire,he,d,flay,the,poor,bastards,said,ebben,a,squat,bald,man,muscled,like,a,bag,of,rocks,[END]
fire,is,life,up,here,said,qhorin,halfhand,but,it,can,be,death,as,well,by,his,command,they,d,risked,no,open,flames,since,entering,the,mountains,[END]
they,ate,cold,salt,beef,hard,bread,and,harder,cheese,and,slept,clothed,and,huddled,beneath,a,pile,of,cloaks,and,furs,grateful,for,each,other,s,warmth,[END]
it,made,jon,remember,cold,nights,long,ago,at,winterfell,when,he,d,shared,a,bed,with,his,brothers,[END]
these,men,were,brothers,too,though,the,bed,they,shared,was,stone,and,earth,[END]

he,was,a,short,wiry,man,near,fifty,and,grey,of,beard,but,stronger,than,he,seemed,and,he,had,the,best,night,eyes,of,anyone,jon,had,ever,known,[END]
he,needed,them,tonight,[END]
by,day,the,mountains,were,blue-grey,brushed,with,frost,but,once,the,sun,vanished,behind,the,jagged,peaks,they,turned,black,[END]

so,he,scaled,the,wall,skipped,down,the,kingsroad,and,walked,into,winterfell,one,winter,s,night,with,harp,in,hand,naming,himself,sygerrik,of,skagos,[END]
sygerrik,means,deceiver,in,the,old,tongue,that,the,first,men,spoke,and,the,giants,still,speak,[END]
north,or,south,singers,always,find,a,ready,welcome,so,bael,ate,at,lord,stark,s,own,table,and,played,for,the,lord,in,his,high,seat,until,half,the,night,was,gone,[END]
the,old,songs,he,played,and,new,ones,he,d,made,himself,and,he,played,and,sang,so,well,that,when,he,was,done,the,lord,offered,to,let,him,name,his,own,reward,[END]
all,i,ask,is,a,flower,bael,answered,the,fairest,flower,that,blooms,in,the,gardens,o,winterfell,[END]

it,was,unseemly,she,knew,but,she,could,not,seem,to,help,herself,the,tears,would,come,sometimes,over,a,trifle,and,nothing,she,did,could,hold,them,back,[END]

the,imp,had,moved,most,of,the,gold,cloaks,to,the,city,walls,and,the,white,knights,of,the,kingsguard,had,duties,more,important,than,dogging,her,heels,[END]
sansa,could,go,where,she,would,so,long,as,she,did,not,try,to,leave,the,castle,but,there,was,nowhere,she,wanted,to,go,[END]
she,crossed,over,the,dry,moat,with,its,cruel,iron,spikes,and,made,her,way,up,the,narrow,turnpike,stair,but,when,she,reached,the,door,of,her,bedchamber,she,could,not,bear,to,enter,[END]
the,very,walls,of,the,room,made,her,feel,trapped,even,with,the,window,opened,wide,it,felt,as,though,there,were,no,air,to,breathe,[END]
turning,back,to,the,stair,sansa,climbed,[END]
the,smoke,blotted,out,the,stars,and,the,thin,crescent,of,moon,so,the,roof,was,dark,and,thick,with,shadows,[END]
yet,from,here,she,could,see,everything,the,red,keep,s,tall,towers,and,great,cornerforts,the,maze,of,city,streets,beyond,to,south,and,west,the,river,running,black,the,bay,to,the,east,the,columns,of,smoke,and,cinders,and,fires,fires,everywhere,[END]
soldiers,crawled,over,the,city,walls,like,ants,with,torches,and,crowded,the,hoardings,that,had,sprouted,from,the,ramparts,[END]
down,by,the,mud,gate,outlined,against,the,drifting,smoke,she,could,make,out,the,vague,shape,of,the,three,huge,catapults,the,biggest,anyone,had,ever,seen,overtopping,the,walls,by,a,good,twenty,feet,[END]
yet,none,of,it,made,her,feel,less,fearful,[END]

when,he,left,the,shadow,tower,he,was,only,going,home,again,[END]
was,he,a,good,ranger,[END]
he,was,the,best,of,us,said,the,halfhand,and,the,worst,as,well,[END]
only,fools,like,thoren,smallwood,despise,the,wildlings,[END]
they,are,as,brave,as,we,are,jon,[END]
as,strong,as,quick,as,clever,[END]
but,they,have,no,discipline,[END]
they,name,themselves,the,free,folk,and,each,one,thinks,himself,as,good,as,a,king,and,wiser,than,a,maester,[END]
mance,was,the,same,[END]
he,never,learned,how,to,obey,[END]
no,more,than,me,said,jon,quietly,[END]
qhorin,s,shrewd,grey,eyes,seemed,to,see,right,through,him,[END]
so,you,let,her,go,he,did,not,sound,the,least,surprised,[END]
you,know,[END]
now,[END]
tell,me,why,you,spared,her,[END]
it,was,hard,to,put,into,words,[END]
my,father,never,used,a,headsman,[END]
he,said,he,owed,it,to,men,he,killed,to,look,into,their,eyes,and,hear,their,last,words,[END]
and,when,i,looked,into,ygritte,s,eyes,i,[END]
jon,stared,down,at,his,hands,helplessly,[END]
i,know,she,was,an,enemy,but,there,was,no,evil,in,her,[END]
no,more,than,in,the,other,two,[END]
it,was,their,lives,or,ours,jon,said,[END]
if,they,had,seen,us,if,they,had,sounded,that,horn,[END]
the,wildlings,would,hunt,us,down,and,slay,us,true,enough,[END]
stonesnake,has,the,horn,now,though,and,we,took,ygritte,s,knife,and,axe,[END]
she,s,behind,us,afoot,unarmed,[END]
and,not,like,to,be,a,threat,qhorin,agreed,[END]
if,i,had,needed,her,dead,i,would,have,left,her,with,ebben,or,done,the,thing,myself,[END]
then,why,did,you,command,it,of,me,[END]
i,did,not,command,it,[END]
i,told,you,to,do,what,needed,to,be,done,and,left,you,to,decide,what,that,would,be,qhorin,stood,and,slid,his,longsword,back,into,its,scabbard,[END]
when,i,want,a,mountain,scaled,i,call,on,stonesnake,[END]
should,i,need,to,put,an,arrow,through,the,eye,of,some,foe,across,a,windy,battlefield,i,summon,squire,dalbridge,[END]
ebben,can,make,any,man,give,up,his,secrets,[END]
to,lead,men,you,must,know,them,jon,snow,[END]
i,know,more,of,you,now,than,i,did,this,morning,[END]
and,if,i,had,slain,her,asked,jon,[END]
she,would,be,dead,and,i,would,know,you,better,than,i,had,before,[END]
but,enough,talk,[END]
you,ought,be,sleeping,[END]
we,have,leagues,to,go,and,dangers,to,face,[END]
you,will,need,your,strength,[END]
jon,did,not,think,sleep,would,come,easily,but,he,knew,the,halfhand,was,right,[END]
he,found,a,place,out,of,the,wind,beneath,an,overhang,of,rock,and,took,off,his,cloak,to,use,it,for,a,blanket,[END]
ghost,he,called,[END]
here,[END]
to,me,he,always,slept,better,with,the,great,white,wolf,beside,him,there,was,comfort,in,the,smell,of,him,and,welcome,warmth,in,that,shaggy,pale,fur,[END]
this,time,though,ghost,did,no,more,than,look,at,him,[END]
then,he,turned,away,and,padded,around,the,garrons,and,quick,as,that,he,was,gone,[END]
he,wants,to,hunt,jon,thought,[END]
perhaps,there,were,goats,in,these,mountains,[END]
the,shadowcats,must,live,on,something,[END]
just,don,t,try,and,bring,down,a,cat,he,muttered,[END]
even,for,a,direwolf,that,would,be,dangerous,[END]
he,tugged,his,cloak,over,him,and,stretched,out,beneath,the,rock,[END]
when,he,closed,his,eyes,he,dreamed,of,direwolves,[END]
there,were,five,of,them,when,there,should,have,been,six,and,they,were,scattered,each,apart,from,the,others,[END]
he,felt,a,deep,ache,of,emptiness,a,sense,of,incompleteness,[END]
the,forest,was,vast,and,cold,and,they,were,so,small,so,lost,[END]
his,brothers,were,out,there,somewhere,and,his,sister,but,he,had,lost,their,scent,[END]
he,sat,on,his,haunches,and,lifted,his,head,to,the,darkening,sky,and,his,cry,echoed,through,the,forest,a,long,lonely,mournful,sound,[END]
as,it,died,away,he,pricked,up,his,ears,listening,for,an,answer,but,the,only,sound,was,the,sigh,of,blowing,snow,[END]
jon,[END]
the,call,came,from,behind,him,softer,than,a,whisper,but,strong,too,[END]
can,a,shout,be,silent,[END]
he,turned,his,head,searching,for,his,brother,for,a,glimpse,of,a,lean,grey,shape,moving,beneath,the,trees,but,there,was,nothing,only,[END]
a,weirwood,[END]
it,seemed,to,sprout,from,solid,rock,its,pale,roots,twisting,up,from,a,myriad,of,fissures,and,hairline,cracks,[END]
the,tree,was,slender,compared,to,other,weirwoods,he,had,seen,no,more,than,a,sapling,yet,it,was,growing,as,he,watched,its,limbs,thickening,as,they,reached,for,the,sky,[END]
wary,he,circled,the,smooth,white,trunk,until,he,came,to,the,face,[END]
red,eyes,looked,at,him,[END]
fierce,eyes,they,were,yet,glad,to,see,him,[END]
the,weirwood,had,his,brother,s,face,[END]
had,his,brother,always,had,three,eyes,[END]
not,always,came,the,silent,shout,[END]
not,before,the,crow,[END]
he,sniffed,at,the,bark,smelled,wolf,and,tree,and,boy,but,behind,that,there,were,other,scents,the,rich,brown,smell,of,warm,earth,and,the,hard,grey,smell,of,stone,and,something,else,something,terrible,[END]
death,he,knew,[END]
he,was,smelling,death,[END]
he,cringed,back,his,hair,bristling,and,bared,his,fangs,[END]
don,t,be,afraid,i,like,it,in,the,dark,[END]
no,one,can,see,you,but,you,can,see,them,[END]
but,first,you,have,to,open,your,eyes,[END]
see,[END]
like,this,[END]
and,the,tree,reached,down,and,touched,him,[END]
and,suddenly,he,was,back,in,the,mountains,his,paws,sunk,deep,in,a,drift,of,snow,as,he,stood,upon,the,edge,of,a,great,precipice,[END]
before,him,the,skirling,pass,opened,up,into,airy,emptiness,and,a,long,vee-shaped,valley,lay,spread,beneath,him,like,a,quilt,awash,in,all,the,colors,of,an,autumn,afternoon,[END]
a,vast,blue-white,wall,plugged,one,end,of,the,vale,squeezing,between,the,mountains,as,if,it,had,shouldered,them,aside,and,for,a,moment,he,thought,he,had,dreamed,himself,back,to,castle,black,[END]
then,he,realized,he,was,looking,at,a,river,of,ice,several,thousand,feet,high,[END]
under,that,glittering,cold,cliff,was,a,great,lake,its,deep,cobalt,waters,reflecting,the,snowcapped,peaks,that,ringed,it,[END]
there,were,men,down,in,the,valley,he,saw,now,many,men,thousands,a,huge,host,[END]
some,were,tearing,great,holes,in,the,half-frozen,ground,while,others,trained,for,war,[END]
he,watched,as,a,swarming,mass,of,riders,charged,a,shield,wall,astride,horses,no,larger,than,ants,[END]
the,sound,of,their,mock,battle,was,a,rustling,of,steel,leaves,drifting,faintly,on,the,wind,[END]
their,encampment,had,no,plan,to,it,he,saw,no,ditches,no,sharpened,stakes,no,neat,rows,of,horse,lines,[END]
everywhere,crude,earthen,shelters,and,hide,tents,sprouted,haphazardly,like,a,pox,on,the,face,of,the,earth,[END]
he,spied,untidy,mounds,of,hay,smelled,goats,and,sheep,horses,and,pigs,dogs,in,great,profusion,[END]
tendrils,of,dark,smoke,rose,from,a,thousand,cookfires,[END]
this,is,no,army,no,more,than,it,is,a,town,[END]
this,is,a,whole,people,come,together,[END]
across,the,long,lake,one,of,the,mounds,moved,[END]
he,watched,it,more,closely,and,saw,that,it,was,not,dirt,at,all,but,alive,a,shaggy,lumbering,beast,with,a,snake,for,a,nose,and,tusks,larger,than,those,of,the,greatest,boar,that,had,ever,lived,[END]
and,the,thing,riding,it,was,huge,as,well,and,his,shape,was,wrong,too,thick,in,the,leg,and,hips,to,be,a,man,[END]

as,he,lifted,his,eyes,to,the,ice-white,mountain,heights,above,a,shadow,plummeted,out,of,the,sky,[END]

sometimes,it,was,so,dark,that,they,dismounted,and,went,ahead,on,foot,each,man,leading,his,garron,[END]
once,ebben,suggested,that,some,torches,might,serve,them,well,but,qhorin,said,no,fire,and,that,was,the,end,of,that,[END]
they,reached,the,stone,bridge,at,the,summit,and,began,to,descend,again,[END]
off,in,the,darkness,a,shadowcat,screamed,in,fury,its,voice,bouncing,off,the,rocks,so,it,seemed,as,though,a,dozen,other,cats,were,giving,answer,[END]
once,jon,thought,he,saw,a,pair,of,glowing,eyes,on,a,ledge,overhead,as,big,as,harvest,moons,[END]
in,the,black,hour,before,dawn,they,stopped,to,let,the,horses,drink,and,fed,them,each,a,handful,of,oats,and,a,twist,or,two,of,hay,[END]
we,are,not,far,from,the,place,the,wildlings,died,said,qhorin,[END]

the,right,man,he,looked,at,squire,dalbridge,[END]

he,s,earned,it,poor,beastie,[END]

he,ll,sprout,some,new,feathers,[END]

pod,dressed,him,for,his,ordeal,in,a,plush,velvet,tunic,of,lannister,crimson,and,brought,him,his,chain,of,office,[END]

his,sister,misliked,being,reminded,that,he,was,the,king,s,hand,and,he,did,not,wish,to,inflame,the,relations,between,them,any,further,[END]

i,ll,tell,my,sister,he,wanted,to,see,how,she,took,the,news,[END]
he,wanted,that,very,much,[END]
the,queen,looked,especially,lovely,that,night,[END]
she,wore,a,low-cut,gown,of,deep,green,velvet,that,brought,out,the,color,of,her,eyes,[END]
her,golden,hair,tumbled,across,her,bare,shoulders,and,around,her,waist,was,a,woven,belt,studded,with,emeralds,[END]

he,said,not,a,word,[END]
cersei,blinked,at,him,innocently,and,took,the,parchment,from,his,hand,[END]
i,trust,you,re,pleased,he,said,as,she,read,[END]
you,wanted,the,stark,boy,dead,i,believe,[END]
cersei,made,a,sour,face,[END]
it,was,jaime,who,threw,him,from,that,window,not,me,[END]
for,love,he,said,as,if,that,would,please,me,[END]
it,was,a,stupid,thing,to,do,and,dangerous,besides,but,when,did,our,sweet,brother,ever,stop,to,think,[END]
the,boy,saw,you,tyrion,pointed,out,[END]
he,was,a,child,[END]
i,could,have,frightened,him,into,silence,she,looked,at,the,letter,thoughtfully,[END]

this,was,never,what,i,wanted,he,told,them,as,he,worked,[END]
they,gave,me,no,choice,the,corpses,made,no,answer,but,only,grew,colder,and,heavier,[END]
the,night,before,it,had,been,the,miller,s,wife,[END]
theon,had,forgotten,her,name,but,he,remembered,her,body,soft,pillowy,breasts,and,stretch,marks,on,her,belly,the,way,she,clawed,his,back,when,he,fucked,her,[END]
last,night,in,his,dream,he,had,been,in,bed,with,her,once,again,but,this,time,she,had,teeth,above,and,below,and,she,tore,out,his,throat,even,as,she,was,gnawing,off,his,manhood,[END]

and,then,the,tall,doors,opened,with,a,crash,and,a,freezing,gale,blew,down,the,hall,and,robb,came,walking,out,of,the,night,[END]

a,dream,he,muttered,that,was,all,it,was,[END]
it,meant,nothing,[END]
nothing,luwin,agreed,solemnly,[END]
he,left,a,sleeping,draught,but,theon,poured,it,down,the,privy,shaft,the,moment,he,was,gone,[END]
luwin,was,a,man,as,well,as,a,maester,and,the,man,had,no,love,for,him,[END]
he,wants,me,to,sleep,yes,[END]
to,sleep,and,never,wake,[END]
he,d,like,that,as,much,as,asha,would,[END]
