the,deck,of,black,betha,churned,as,crewmen,ran,to,their,tasks,pushing,through,the,soldiers,who,always,seemed,to,be,in,the,way,no,matter,where,they,stood,[END]
ser,imry,had,decreed,that,they,would,enter,the,river,on,oars,alone,so,as,not,to,expose,their,sails,to,the,scorpions,and,spitfires,on,the,walls,of,king,s,landing,[END]
davos,could,make,out,fury,well,to,the,southeast,her,sails,shimmering,golden,as,they,came,down,the,crowned,stag,of,baratheon,blazoned,on,the,canvas,[END]
from,her,decks,stannis,baratheon,had,commanded,the,assault,on,dragonstone,sixteen,years,before,but,this,time,he,had,chosen,to,ride,with,his,army,trusting,fury,and,the,command,of,his,fleet,to,his,wife,s,brother,ser,imry,who,d,come,over,to,his,cause,at,storm,s,end,with,lord,alester,and,all,the,other,florents,[END]
davos,knew,fury,as,well,as,he,knew,his,own,ships,[END]
above,her,three,hundred,oars,was,a,deck,given,over,wholly,to,scorpions,and,topside,she,mounted,catapults,fore,and,aft,large,enough,to,fling,barrels,of,burning,pitch,[END]
a,most,formidable,ship,and,very,swift,as,well,although,ser,imry,had,packed,her,bow,to,stern,with,armored,knights,and,men-at-arms,at,some,cost,to,her,speed,[END]
the,warhorns,sounded,again,commands,drifting,back,from,the,fury,[END]
davos,felt,a,tingle,in,his,missing,fingertips,[END]
out,oars,he,shouted,[END]
form,line,a,hundred,blades,dipped,down,into,the,water,as,the,oarmaster,s,drum,began,to,boom,[END]
the,sound,was,like,the,beating,of,a,great,slow,heart,and,the,oars,moved,at,every,stroke,a,hundred,men,pulling,as,one,[END]
wooden,wings,had,sprouted,from,the,wraith,and,lady,marya,as,well,[END]
the,three,galleys,kept,pace,their,blades,churning,the,water,[END]
slow,cruise,davos,called,[END]
lord,velaryon,s,silver-hulled,pride,of,driftmark,had,moved,into,her,position,to,port,of,wraith,and,bold,laughter,was,coming,up,fast,but,harridan,was,only,now,getting,her,oars,into,the,water,and,seahorse,was,still,struggling,to,bring,down,her,mast,[END]
davos,looked,astern,[END]
yes,there,far,to,the,south,that,could,only,be,swordfish,lagging,as,ever,[END]
she,dipped,two,hundred,oars,and,mounted,the,largest,ram,in,the,fleet,though,davos,had,grave,doubts,about,her,captain,[END]
he,could,hear,soldiers,shouting,encouragement,to,each,other,across,the,water,[END]
they,d,been,little,more,than,ballast,since,storm,s,end,and,were,eager,to,get,at,the,foe,confident,of,victory,[END]
in,that,they,were,of,one,mind,with,their,admiral,lord,high,captain,ser,imry,florent,[END]
three,days,past,he,had,summoned,all,his,captains,to,a,war,council,aboard,the,fury,while,the,fleet,lay,anchored,at,the,mouth,of,the,wendwater,in,order,to,acquaint,them,with,his,dispositions,[END]
davos,and,his,sons,had,been,assigned,a,place,in,the,second,line,of,battle,well,out,on,the,dangerous,starboard,wing,[END]
a,place,of,honor,allard,had,declared,well,satisfied,with,the,chance,to,prove,his,valor,[END]
a,place,of,peril,his,father,had,pointed,out,[END]
his,sons,had,given,him,pitying,looks,even,young,maric,[END]
the,onion,knight,has,become,an,old,woman,he,could,hear,them,thinking,still,a,smuggler,at,heart,[END]
well,the,last,was,true,enough,he,would,make,no,apologies,for,it,[END]
seaworth,had,a,lordly,ring,to,it,but,down,deep,he,was,still,davos,of,flea,bottom,coming,home,to,his,city,on,its,three,high,hills,[END]
he,knew,as,much,of,ships,and,sails,and,shores,as,any,man,in,the,seven,kingdoms,and,had,fought,his,share,of,desperate,fights,sword,to,sword,on,a,wet,deck,[END]
but,to,this,sort,of,battle,he,came,a,maiden,nervous,and,afraid,[END]
smugglers,do,not,sound,warhorns,and,raise,banners,[END]
when,they,smell,danger,they,raise,sail,and,run,before,the,wind,[END]
had,he,been,admiral,he,might,have,done,it,all,differently,[END]
for,a,start,he,would,have,sent,a,few,of,his,swiftest,ships,to,probe,upriver,and,see,what,awaited,them,instead,of,smashing,in,headlong,[END]
when,he,had,suggested,as,much,to,ser,imry,the,lord,high,captain,had,thanked,him,courteously,but,his,eyes,were,not,as,polite,[END]
who,is,this,lowborn,craven,[END]
those,eyes,asked,[END]
is,he,the,one,who,bought,his,knighthood,with,an,onion,[END]
with,four,times,as,many,ships,as,the,boy,king,ser,imry,saw,no,need,for,caution,or,deceptive,tactics,[END]
he,had,organized,the,fleet,into,ten,lines,of,battle,each,of,twenty,ships,[END]
the,first,two,lines,would,sweep,up,the,river,to,engage,and,destroy,joffrey,s,little,fleet,or,the,boy,s,toys,as,ser,imry,dubbed,them,to,the,mirth,of,his,lordly,captains,[END]
those,that,followed,would,land,companies,of,archers,and,spearmen,beneath,the,city,walls,and,only,then,join,the,fight,on,the,river,[END]
the,smaller,slower,ships,to,the,rear,would,ferry,over,the,main,part,of,stannis,s,host,from,the,south,bank,protected,by,salladhor,saan,and,his,lyseni,who,would,stand,out,in,the,bay,in,case,the,lannisters,had,other,ships,hidden,up,along,the,coast,poised,to,sweep,down,on,their,rear,[END]
to,be,fair,there,was,reason,for,ser,imry,s,haste,[END]
the,winds,had,not,used,them,kindly,on,the,voyage,up,from,storm,s,end,[END]
they,had,lost,two,cogs,to,the,rocks,of,shipbreaker,bay,on,the,very,day,they,set,sail,a,poor,way,to,begin,[END]
one,of,the,myrish,galleys,had,foundered,in,the,straits,of,tarth,and,a,storm,had,overtaken,them,as,they,were,entering,the,gullet,scattering,the,fleet,across,half,the,narrow,sea,[END]
all,but,twelve,ships,had,finally,regrouped,behind,the,sheltering,spine,of,massey,s,hook,in,the,calmer,waters,of,blackwater,bay,but,not,before,they,had,lost,considerable,time,[END]
stannis,would,have,reached,the,rush,days,ago,[END]
the,kingsroad,ran,from,storm,s,end,straight,to,king,s,landing,a,much,shorter,route,than,by,sea,and,his,host,was,largely,mounted,near,twenty,thousand,knights,light,horse,and,freeriders,renly,s,unwilling,legacy,to,his,brother,[END]
they,would,have,made,good,time,but,armored,destriers,and,twelve-foot,lances,would,avail,them,little,against,the,deep,waters,of,the,blackwater,rush,and,the,high,stone,walls,of,the,city,[END]
stannis,would,be,camped,with,his,lords,on,the,south,bank,of,the,river,doubtless,seething,with,impatience,and,wondering,what,ser,imry,had,done,with,his,fleet,[END]
off,merling,rock,two,days,before,they,had,sighted,a,half-dozen,fishing,skiffs,[END]
the,fisherfolk,had,fled,before,them,but,one,by,one,they,had,been,overtaken,and,boarded,[END]
a,small,spoon,of,victory,is,just,the,thing,to,settle,the,stomach,before,battle,ser,imry,had,declared,happily,[END]
it,makes,the,men,hungry,for,a,larger,helping,but,davos,had,been,more,interested,in,what,the,captives,had,to,say,about,the,defenses,at,king,s,landing,[END]
the,dwarf,had,been,busy,building,some,sort,of,boom,to,close,off,the,mouth,of,the,river,though,the,fishermen,differed,as,to,whether,the,work,had,been,completed,or,not,[END]
he,found,himself,wishing,it,had,[END]
if,the,river,was,closed,to,them,ser,imry,would,have,no,choice,but,to,pause,and,take,stock,[END]
the,sea,was,full,of,sound,shouts,and,calls,warhorns,and,drums,and,the,trill,of,pipes,the,slap,of,wood,on,water,as,thousands,of,oars,rose,and,fell,[END]
keep,line,davos,shouted,[END]
a,gust,of,wind,tugged,at,his,old,green,cloak,[END]
a,jerkin,of,boiled,leather,and,a,pothelm,at,his,feet,were,his,only,armor,[END]
at,sea,heavy,steel,was,as,like,to,cost,a,man,his,life,as,to,save,it,he,believed,[END]
ser,imry,and,the,other,highborn,captains,did,not,share,his,view,they,glittered,as,they,paced,their,decks,[END]
harridan,and,seahorse,had,slipped,into,their,places,now,and,lord,celtigar,s,red,claw,beyond,them,[END]
to,starboard,of,allard,s,lady,marya,were,the,three,galleys,that,stannis,had,seized,from,the,unfortunate,lord,sunglass,piety,prayer,and,devotion,their,decks,crawling,with,archers,[END]
even,swordfish,was,closing,lumbering,and,rolling,through,a,thickening,sea,under,both,oars,and,sail,[END]
a,ship,of,that,many,oars,ought,to,be,much,faster,davos,reflected,with,disapproval,[END]
it,s,that,ram,she,carries,it,s,too,big,she,has,no,balance,[END]
the,wind,was,gusting,from,the,south,but,under,oars,it,made,no,matter,[END]
they,would,be,sweeping,in,on,the,flood,tide,but,the,lannisters,would,have,the,river,current,to,their,favor,and,the,blackwater,rush,flowed,strong,and,swift,where,it,met,the,sea,[END]
the,first,shock,would,inevitably,favor,the,foe,[END]
we,are,fools,to,meet,them,on,the,blackwater,davos,thought,[END]
in,any,encounter,on,the,open,sea,their,battle,lines,would,envelop,the,enemy,fleet,on,both,flanks,driving,them,inward,to,destruction,[END]
on,the,river,though,the,numbers,and,weight,of,ser,imry,s,ships,would,count,for,less,[END]
they,could,not,dress,more,than,twenty,ships,abreast,lest,they,risk,tangling,their,oars,and,colliding,with,each,other,[END]
beyond,the,line,of,warships,davos,could,see,the,red,keep,up,on,aegon,s,high,hill,dark,against,a,lemon,sky,with,the,mouth,of,the,rush,opening,out,below,[END]
across,the,river,the,south,shore,was,black,with,men,and,horses,stirring,like,angry,ants,as,they,caught,sight,of,the,approaching,ships,[END]
stannis,would,have,kept,them,busy,building,rafts,and,fletching,arrows,yet,even,so,the,waiting,would,have,been,a,hard,thing,to,bear,[END]
trumpets,sounded,from,among,them,tiny,and,brazen,soon,swallowed,by,the,roar,of,a,thousand,shouts,[END]
davos,closed,his,stubby,hand,around,the,pouch,that,held,his,fingerbones,and,mouthed,a,silent,prayer,for,luck,[END]
fury,herself,would,center,the,first,line,of,battle,flanked,by,the,lord,steffon,and,the,stag,of,the,sea,each,of,two,hundred,oars,[END]
on,the,port,and,starboard,wings,were,the,hundreds,lady,harra,brightfish,laughing,lord,sea,demon,horned,honor,ragged,jenna,trident,three,swift,sword,princess,rhaenys,dog,s,nose,sceptre,faithful,red,raven,queen,alysanne,cat,courageous,and,dragonsbane,[END]
from,every,stern,streamed,the,fiery,heart,of,the,lord,of,light,red,and,yellow,and,orange,[END]
behind,davos,and,his,sons,came,another,line,of,hundreds,commanded,by,knights,and,lordly,captains,and,then,the,smaller,slower,myrish,contingent,none,dipping,more,than,eighty,oars,[END]
farther,back,would,come,the,sailed,ships,carracks,and,lumbering,great,cogs,and,last,of,all,salladhor,saan,in,his,proud,valyrian,a,towering,three-hundred,paced,by,the,rest,of,his,galleys,with,their,distinctive,striped,hulls,[END]
the,flamboyant,lyseni,princeling,had,not,been,pleased,to,be,assigned,the,rear,guard,but,it,was,clear,that,ser,imry,trusted,him,no,more,than,stannis,did,[END]
too,many,complaints,and,too,much,talk,of,the,gold,he,was,owed,[END]
davos,was,sorry,nonetheless,[END]
salladhor,saan,was,a,resourceful,old,pirate,and,his,crews,were,born,seamen,fearless,in,a,fight,[END]
they,were,wasted,in,the,rear,[END]
ahooooooooooooooooooooooooo,[END]
the,call,rolled,across,whitecaps,and,churning,oars,from,the,forecastle,of,the,fury,ser,imry,was,sounding,the,attack,[END]
ahoooooooooooooooooooo,ahooooooooooooooooooooo,[END]
swordfish,had,joined,the,line,at,last,though,she,still,had,her,sail,raised,[END]
fast,cruise,davos,barked,[END]
the,drum,began,to,beat,more,quickly,and,the,stroke,picked,up,the,blades,of,the,oars,cutting,water,splash-swoosh,splash-swoosh,splash-swoosh,[END]
on,deck,soldiers,banged,sword,against,shield,while,archers,quietly,strung,their,bows,and,pulled,the,first,arrow,from,the,quivers,at,their,belts,[END]
the,galleys,of,the,first,line,of,battle,obscured,his,vision,so,davos,paced,the,deck,searching,for,a,better,view,[END]
he,saw,no,sign,of,any,boom,the,mouth,of,the,river,was,open,as,if,to,swallow,them,all,[END]
except,[END]
in,his,smuggling,days,davos,had,often,jested,that,he,knew,the,waterfront,at,king,s,landing,a,deal,better,than,the,back,of,his,hand,since,he,had,not,spent,a,good,part,of,his,life,sneaking,in,and,out,of,the,back,of,his,hand,[END]
the,squat,towers,of,raw,new,stone,that,stood,opposite,one,another,at,the,mouth,of,the,blackwater,might,mean,nothing,to,ser,imry,florent,but,to,him,it,was,as,if,two,extra,fingers,had,sprouted,from,his,knuckles,[END]
shading,his,eyes,against,the,westering,sun,he,peered,at,those,towers,more,closely,[END]
they,were,too,small,to,hold,much,of,a,garrison,[END]
the,one,on,the,north,bank,was,built,against,the,bluff,with,the,red,keep,frowning,above,its,counterpart,on,the,south,shore,had,its,footing,in,the,water,[END]
they,dug,a,cut,through,the,bank,he,knew,at,once,[END]
that,would,make,the,tower,very,difficult,to,assault,attackers,would,need,to,wade,through,the,water,or,bridge,the,little,channel,[END]
stannis,had,posted,bowmen,below,to,fire,up,at,the,defenders,whenever,one,was,rash,enough,to,lift,his,head,above,the,ramparts,but,otherwise,had,not,troubled,[END]
something,flashed,down,low,where,the,dark,water,swirled,around,the,base,of,the,tower,[END]
it,was,sunlight,on,steel,and,it,told,davos,seaworth,all,he,needed,to,know,[END]
a,chain,boom,[END]
and,yet,they,have,not,closed,the,river,against,us,[END]
why,[END]
he,could,make,a,guess,at,that,as,well,but,there,was,no,time,to,consider,the,question,[END]
a,shout,went,up,from,the,ships,ahead,and,the,warhorns,blew,again,the,enemy,was,before,them,[END]
between,the,flashing,oars,of,sceptre,and,faithful,davos,saw,a,thin,line,of,galleys,drawn,across,the,river,the,sun,glinting,off,the,gold,paint,that,marked,their,hulls,[END]
he,knew,those,ships,as,well,as,he,knew,his,own,[END]
when,he,had,been,a,smuggler,he,d,always,felt,safer,knowing,whether,the,sail,on,the,horizon,marked,a,fast,ship,or,a,slow,one,and,whether,her,captain,was,a,young,man,hungry,for,glory,or,an,old,one,serving,out,his,days,[END]
ahooooooooooooooooooooooooooo,the,warhorns,called,[END]
battle,speed,davos,shouted,[END]
on,port,and,starboard,he,heard,dale,and,allard,giving,the,same,command,[END]
drums,began,to,beat,furiously,oars,rose,and,fell,and,black,betha,surged,forward,[END]
when,he,glanced,toward,wraith,dale,gave,him,a,salute,[END]
swordfish,was,lagging,once,more,wallowing,in,the,wake,of,the,smaller,ships,to,either,side,elsewise,the,line,was,straight,as,a,shield,wall,[END]
the,river,that,had,seemed,so,narrow,from,a,distance,now,stretched,wide,as,a,sea,but,the,city,had,grown,gigantic,as,well,[END]
glowering,down,from,aegon,s,high,hill,the,red,keep,commanded,the,approaches,[END]
its,iron-crowned,battlements,massive,towers,and,thick,red,walls,gave,it,the,aspect,of,a,ferocious,beast,hunched,above,river,and,streets,[END]
the,bluffs,on,which,it,crouched,were,steep,and,rocky,spotted,with,lichen,and,gnarled,thorny,trees,[END]
the,fleet,would,have,to,pass,below,the,castle,to,reach,the,harbor,and,city,beyond,[END]
the,first,line,was,in,the,river,now,but,the,enemy,galleys,were,backing,water,[END]
they,mean,to,draw,us,in,[END]
they,want,us,jammed,close,constricted,no,way,to,sweep,around,their,flanks,[END]
and,with,that,boom,behind,us,[END]
he,paced,his,deck,craning,his,neck,for,a,better,look,at,joffrey,s,fleet,[END]
the,boy,s,toys,included,the,ponderous,godsgrace,he,saw,the,old,slow,prince,aemon,the,lady,of,silk,and,her,sister,lady,s,shame,wildwind,kingslander,white,hart,lance,seaflower,[END]
but,where,was,the,lionstar,[END]
where,was,the,beautiful,lady,lyanna,that,king,robert,had,named,in,honor,of,the,maid,he,d,loved,and,lost,[END]
and,where,was,king,robert,s,hammer,[END]
she,was,the,largest,war,galley,in,the,royal,fleet,four,hundred,oars,the,only,warship,the,boy,king,owned,capable,of,overmatching,fury,[END]
by,rights,she,should,have,formed,the,heart,of,any,defense,[END]
davos,tasted,a,trap,yet,he,saw,no,sign,of,any,foes,sweeping,in,behind,them,only,the,great,fleet,of,stannis,baratheon,in,their,ordered,ranks,stretching,back,to,the,watery,horizon,[END]
will,they,raise,the,chain,and,cut,us,in,two,[END]
he,could,not,see,what,good,that,would,serve,[END]
the,ships,left,out,in,the,bay,could,still,land,men,north,of,the,city,a,slower,crossing,but,safer,[END]
a,flight,of,flickering,orange,birds,took,wing,from,the,castle,twenty,or,thirty,of,them,pots,of,burning,pitch,arcing,out,over,the,river,trailing,threads,of,flame,[END]
the,waters,ate,most,but,a,few,found,the,decks,of,galleys,in,the,first,line,of,battle,spreading,flame,when,they,shattered,[END]
men-at-arms,were,scrambling,on,queen,alysanne,s,deck,and,he,could,see,smoke,rising,from,three,different,spots,on,dragonsbane,nearest,the,bank,[END]
by,then,a,second,flight,was,on,its,way,and,arrows,were,falling,as,well,hissing,down,from,the,archers,nests,that,studded,the,towers,above,[END]
a,soldier,tumbled,over,cat,s,gunwale,crashed,off,the,oars,and,sank,[END]
the,first,man,to,die,today,davos,thought,but,he,will,not,be,the,last,[END]
atop,the,red,keep,s,battlements,streamed,the,boy,king,s,banners,the,crowned,stag,of,baratheon,on,its,gold,field,the,lion,of,lannister,on,crimson,[END]
more,pots,of,pitch,came,flying,[END]
davos,heard,men,shriek,as,fire,spread,across,courageous,[END]
her,oarsmen,were,safe,below,protected,from,missiles,by,the,half,deck,that,sheltered,them,but,the,men-at-arms,crowded,topside,were,not,so,fortunate,[END]
the,starboard,wing,was,taking,all,the,damage,as,he,had,feared,[END]
it,will,be,our,turn,soon,he,reminded,himself,uneasy,[END]
black,betha,was,well,in,range,of,the,firepots,being,the,sixth,ship,out,from,the,north,bank,[END]
to,starboard,she,had,only,allard,s,lady,marya,the,ungainly,swordfish,so,far,behind,now,that,she,was,nearer,the,third,line,than,the,second,and,piety,prayer,and,devotion,who,would,need,all,the,godly,intervention,they,could,get,placed,as,vulnerably,as,they,were,[END]
as,the,second,line,swept,past,the,twin,towers,davos,took,a,closer,look,[END]
he,could,see,three,links,of,a,huge,chain,snaking,out,from,a,hole,no,bigger,than,a,man,s,head,and,disappearing,under,the,water,[END]
the,towers,had,a,single,door,set,a,good,twenty,feet,off,the,ground,[END]
bowmen,on,the,roof,of,the,northern,tower,were,firing,down,at,prayer,and,devotion,[END]
the,archers,on,devotion,fired,back,and,davos,heard,a,man,scream,as,the,arrows,found,him,[END]
captain,ser,his,son,matthos,was,at,his,elbow,[END]
your,helm,davos,took,it,with,both,hands,and,slid,it,over,his,head,[END]
the,pothelm,was,visorless,he,hated,having,his,vision,impeded,[END]
by,then,the,pitch,pots,were,raining,down,around,them,[END]
he,saw,one,shatter,on,the,deck,of,lady,marya,but,allard,s,crew,quickly,beat,it,out,[END]
to,port,warhorns,sounded,from,the,pride,of,driftmark,[END]
the,oars,flung,up,sprays,of,water,with,every,stroke,[END]
the,yard-long,shaft,of,a,scorpion,came,down,not,two,feet,from,matthos,and,sank,into,the,wood,of,the,deck,thrumming,[END]
ahead,the,first,line,was,within,bowshot,of,the,enemy,flights,of,arrows,flew,between,the,ships,hissing,like,striking,snakes,[END]
south,of,the,blackwater,davos,saw,men,dragging,crude,rafts,toward,the,water,while,ranks,and,columns,formed,up,beneath,a,thousand,streaming,banners,[END]
the,fiery,heart,was,everywhere,though,the,tiny,black,stag,imprisoned,in,the,flames,was,too,small,to,make,out,[END]
we,should,be,flying,the,crowned,stag,he,thought,[END]
the,stag,was,king,robert,s,sigil,the,city,would,rejoice,to,see,it,[END]
this,stranger,s,standard,serves,only,to,set,men,against,us,[END]
he,could,not,behold,the,fiery,heart,without,thinking,of,the,shadow,melisandre,had,birthed,in,the,gloom,beneath,storm,s,end,[END]
at,least,we,fight,this,battle,in,the,light,with,the,weapons,of,honest,men,he,told,himself,[END]
the,red,woman,and,her,dark,children,would,have,no,part,of,it,[END]
stannis,had,shipped,her,back,to,dragonstone,with,his,bastard,nephew,edric,storm,[END]
his,captains,and,bannermen,had,insisted,that,a,battlefield,was,no,place,for,a,woman,[END]
only,the,queen,s,men,had,dissented,and,then,not,loudly,[END]
all,the,same,the,king,had,been,on,the,point,of,refusing,them,until,lord,bryce,caron,said,your,grace,if,the,sorceress,is,with,us,afterward,men,will,say,it,was,her,victory,not,yours,[END]
they,will,say,you,owe,your,crown,to,her,spells,that,had,turned,the,tide,[END]
davos,himself,had,held,his,tongue,during,the,arguments,but,if,truth,be,told,he,had,not,been,sad,to,see,the,back,of,her,[END]
he,wanted,no,part,of,melisandre,or,her,god,[END]
to,starboard,devotion,drove,toward,shore,sliding,out,a,plank,[END]
archers,scrambled,into,the,shallows,holding,their,bows,high,over,their,heads,to,keep,the,strings,dry,[END]
they,splashed,ashore,on,the,narrow,strand,beneath,the,bluffs,[END]
rocks,came,bouncing,down,from,the,castle,to,crash,among,them,and,arrows,and,spears,as,well,but,the,angle,was,steep,and,the,missiles,seemed,to,do,little,damage,[END]
prayer,landed,two,dozen,yards,upstream,and,piety,was,slanting,toward,the,bank,when,the,defenders,came,pounding,down,the,riverside,the,hooves,of,their,warhorses,sending,up,gouts,of,water,from,the,shallows,[END]
the,knights,fell,among,the,archers,like,wolves,among,chickens,driving,them,back,toward,the,ships,and,into,the,river,before,most,could,notch,an,arrow,[END]
men-at-arms,rushed,to,defend,them,with,spear,and,axe,and,in,three,heartbeats,the,scene,had,turned,to,blood-soaked,chaos,[END]
davos,recognized,the,dog,s-head,helm,of,the,hound,[END]
a,white,cloak,streamed,from,his,shoulders,as,he,rode,his,horse,up,the,plank,onto,the,deck,of,prayer,hacking,down,anyone,who,blundered,within,reach,[END]
beyond,the,castle,king,s,landing,rose,on,its,hills,behind,the,encircling,walls,[END]
the,riverfront,was,a,blackened,desolation,the,lannisters,had,burned,everything,and,pulled,back,within,the,mud,gate,[END]
the,charred,spars,of,sunken,hulks,sat,in,the,shallows,forbidding,access,to,the,long,stone,quays,[END]
we,shall,have,no,landing,there,[END]
he,could,see,the,tops,of,three,huge,trebuchets,behind,the,mud,gate,[END]
high,on,visenya,s,hill,sunlight,blazed,off,the,seven,crystal,towers,of,the,great,sept,of,baelor,[END]
davos,never,saw,the,battle,joined,but,he,heard,it,a,great,rending,crash,as,two,galleys,came,together,[END]
he,could,not,say,which,two,[END]
another,impact,echoed,over,the,water,an,instant,later,and,then,a,third,[END]
beneath,the,screech,of,splintering,wood,he,heard,the,deep,thrum-thump,of,the,fury,s,fore,catapult,[END]
stag,of,the,sea,split,one,of,joffrey,s,galleys,clean,in,two,but,dog,s,nose,was,afire,and,queen,alysanne,was,locked,between,lady,of,silk,and,lady,s,shame,her,crew,fighting,the,boarders,rail-to-rail,[END]
directly,ahead,davos,saw,the,enemy,s,kingslander,drive,between,faithful,and,sceptre,[END]
the,former,slid,her,starboard,oars,out,of,the,way,before,impact,but,sceptre,s,portside,oars,snapped,like,so,much,kindling,as,kingslander,raked,along,her,side,[END]
loose,davos,commanded,and,his,bowmen,sent,a,withering,rain,of,shafts,across,the,water,[END]
he,saw,kingslander,s,captain,fall,and,tried,to,recall,the,man,s,name,[END]
ashore,the,arms,of,the,great,trebuchets,rose,one,two,three,and,a,hundred,stones,climbed,high,into,the,yellow,sky,[END]
each,one,was,as,large,as,a,man,s,head,when,they,fell,they,sent,up,great,gouts,of,water,smashed,through,oak,planking,and,turned,living,men,into,bone,and,pulp,and,gristle,[END]
all,across,the,river,the,first,line,was,engaged,[END]
grappling,hooks,were,flung,out,iron,rams,crashed,through,wooden,hulls,boarders,swarmed,flights,of,arrows,whispered,through,each,other,in,the,drifting,smoke,and,men,died,[END]
but,so,far,none,of,his,[END]
black,betha,swept,upriver,the,sound,of,her,oarmaster,s,drum,thundering,in,her,captain,s,head,as,he,looked,for,a,likely,victim,for,her,ram,[END]
the,beleaguered,queen,alysanne,was,trapped,between,two,lannister,warships,the,three,made,fast,by,hooks,and,lines,[END]
ramming,speed,davos,shouted,[END]
the,drumbeats,blurred,into,a,long,fevered,hammering,and,black,betha,flew,the,water,turning,white,as,milk,as,it,parted,for,her,prow,[END]
allard,had,seen,the,same,chance,lady,marya,ran,beside,them,[END]
the,first,line,had,been,transformed,into,a,confusion,of,separate,struggles,[END]
the,three,tangled,ships,loomed,ahead,turning,their,decks,a,red,chaos,as,men,hacked,at,each,other,with,sword,and,axe,[END]
a,little,more,davos,seaworth,beseeched,the,warrior,bring,her,around,a,little,more,show,me,her,broadside,[END]
the,warrior,must,have,been,listening,[END]
black,betha,and,lady,marya,slammed,into,the,side,of,lady,s,shame,within,an,instant,of,each,other,ramming,her,fore,and,aft,with,such,force,that,men,were,thrown,off,the,deck,of,lady,of,silk,three,boats,away,[END]
davos,almost,bit,his,tongue,off,when,his,teeth,jarred,together,[END]
he,spat,out,blood,[END]
next,time,close,your,mouth,you,fool,[END]
forty,years,at,sea,and,yet,this,was,the,first,time,he,d,rammed,another,ship,[END]
his,archers,were,loosing,arrows,at,will,[END]
back,water,he,commanded,[END]
when,black,betha,reversed,her,oars,the,river,rushed,into,the,splintered,hole,she,left,and,lady,s,shame,fell,to,pieces,before,his,eyes,spilling,dozens,of,men,into,the,river,[END]
some,of,the,living,swam,some,of,the,dead,floated,the,ones,in,heavy,mail,and,plate,sank,to,the,bottom,the,quick,and,the,dead,alike,[END]
the,pleas,of,drowning,men,echoed,in,his,ears,[END]
a,flash,of,green,caught,his,eye,ahead,and,off,to,port,and,a,nest,of,writhing,emerald,serpents,rose,burning,and,hissing,from,the,stern,of,queen,alysanne,[END]

he,grimaced,[END]
burning,pitch,was,one,thing,wildfire,quite,another,[END]
evil,stuff,and,well-nigh,unquenchable,[END]

lady,marya,had,won,clear,too,and,a,good,thing,the,fire,was,spreading,over,queen,alysanne,and,her,foes,faster,than,he,would,have,believed,possible,[END]
men,wreathed,in,green,flame,leapt,into,the,water,shrieking,like,nothing,human,[END]
on,the,walls,of,king,s,landing,spitfires,were,belching,death,and,the,great,trebuchets,behind,the,mud,gate,were,throwing,boulders,[END]
one,the,size,of,an,ox,crashed,down,between,black,betha,and,wraith,rocking,both,ships,and,soaking,every,man,on,deck,[END]
another,not,much,smaller,found,bold,laughter,[END]
the,velaryon,galley,exploded,like,a,child,s,toy,dropped,from,a,tower,spraying,splinters,as,long,as,a,man,s,arm,[END]
through,black,smoke,and,swirling,green,fire,davos,glimpsed,a,swarm,of,small,boats,bearing,downriver,a,confusion,of,ferries,and,wherries,barges,skiffs,rowboats,and,hulks,that,looked,too,rotten,to,float,[END]
it,stank,of,desperation,such,driftwood,could,not,turn,the,tide,of,a,fight,only,get,in,the,way,[END]
the,lines,of,battle,were,hopelessly,ensnarled,he,saw,[END]
off,to,port,lord,steffon,ragged,jenna,and,swift,sword,had,broken,through,and,were,sweeping,upriver,[END]
the,starboard,wing,was,heavily,engaged,however,and,the,center,had,shattered,under,the,stones,of,those,trebuchets,some,captains,turning,downstream,others,veering,to,port,anything,to,escape,that,crushing,rain,[END]
fury,had,swung,her,aft,catapult,to,fire,back,at,the,city,but,she,lacked,the,range,the,barrels,of,pitch,were,shattering,under,the,walls,[END]
sceptre,had,lost,most,of,her,oars,and,faithful,had,been,rammed,and,was,starting,to,list,[END]
he,took,black,betha,between,them,and,struck,a,glancing,blow,at,queen,cersei,s,ornate,carved-and-gilded,pleasure,barge,laden,with,soldiers,instead,of,sweetmeats,now,[END]
the,collision,spilled,a,dozen,of,them,into,the,river,where,betha,s,archers,picked,them,off,as,they,tried,to,stay,afloat,[END]

hard,to,starboard,davos,shouted,[END]
his,men,used,their,oars,to,push,free,of,the,barge,while,others,turned,the,galley,so,her,prow,faced,the,onrushing,white,hart,[END]
for,a,moment,he,feared,he,d,been,too,slow,that,he,was,about,to,be,sunk,but,the,current,helped,swing,black,betha,and,when,the,impact,came,it,was,only,a,glancing,blow,the,two,hulls,scraping,against,each,other,both,ships,snapping,oars,[END]
a,jagged,piece,of,wood,flew,past,his,head,sharp,as,any,spear,[END]
davos,flinched,[END]
board,her,he,shouted,[END]

davos,fought,through,the,press,looking,for,the,other,captain,but,the,man,was,dead,before,he,reached,him,[END]
as,he,stood,over,the,body,someone,caught,him,from,behind,with,an,axe,but,his,helm,turned,the,blow,and,his,skull,was,left,ringing,when,it,might,have,been,split,[END]
dazed,it,was,all,he,could,do,to,roll,[END]
his,attacker,charged,screaming,[END]

captain,ser,the,hart,is,ours,it,was,true,davos,saw,[END]

matthos,lent,him,a,hand,to,help,him,back,over,the,rail,[END]
for,those,few,instants,black,betha,and,white,hart,were,the,calm,eye,in,the,midst,of,the,storm,[END]

cat,was,taking,on,men,from,the,fast-sinking,courageous,[END]

red,raven,rammed,was,slowly,listing,[END]
stag,of,the,sea,was,fighting,fires,and,boarders,both,but,the,fiery,heart,had,been,raised,over,joffrey,s,loyal,man,[END]

he,saw,lord,velaryon,s,pride,of,driftmark,crash,between,two,lannister,river,runners,overturning,one,and,lighting,the,other,up,with,fire,arrows,[END]
on,the,south,bank,knights,were,leading,their,mounts,aboard,the,cogs,and,some,of,the,smaller,galleys,were,already,making,their,way,across,laden,with,men-at-arms,[END]

ser,imry,will,have,his,victory,davos,thought,and,stannis,will,bring,his,host,across,but,gods,be,good,the,cost,of,this,[END]

it,was,swordfish,her,two,banks,of,oars,lifting,and,falling,[END]

no,he,said,[END]

from,inside,her,davos,saw,green,gushing,from,a,thousand,broken,jars,poison,from,the,entrails,of,a,dying,beast,glistening,shining,spreading,across,the,surface,of,the,river,[END]

away,[END]
get,us,off,her,back,water,back,water,the,grappling,lines,were,cut,and,davos,felt,the,deck,move,under,his,feet,as,black,betha,pushed,free,of,white,hart,[END]
her,oars,slid,down,into,the,water,[END]
then,he,heard,a,short,sharp,woof,as,if,someone,had,blown,in,his,ear,[END]

the,deck,vanished,beneath,him,and,black,water,smashed,him,across,the,face,filling,his,nose,and,mouth,[END]

unsure,which,way,was,up,davos,wrestled,the,river,in,blind,panic,until,suddenly,he,broke,the,surface,[END]

swordfish,and,the,hulk,were,gone,blackened,bodies,were,floating,downstream,beside,him,and,choking,men,clinging,to,bits,of,smoking,wood,[END]

it,had,a,dozen,hands,in,each,a,whip,and,whatever,they,touched,burst,into,fire,[END]
he,saw,black,betha,burning,and,white,hart,and,loyal,man,to,either,side,[END]
piety,cat,courageous,sceptre,red,raven,harridan,faithful,fury,they,had,all,gone,up,kingslander,and,godsgrace,as,well,the,demon,was,eating,his,own,[END]
lord,velaryon,s,shining,pride,of,driftmark,was,trying,to,turn,but,the,demon,ran,a,lazy,green,finger,across,her,silvery,oars,and,they,flared,up,like,so,many,tapers,[END]
for,an,instant,she,seemed,to,be,stroking,the,river,with,two,banks,of,long,bright,torches,[END]

he,kicked,to,avoid,a,floating,patch,of,wildfire,[END]
my,sons,davos,thought,but,there,was,no,way,to,look,for,them,amidst,the,roaring,chaos,[END]
another,hulk,heavy,with,wildfire,went,up,behind,him,[END]
the,blackwater,itself,seemed,to,boil,in,its,bed,and,burning,spars,and,burning,men,and,pieces,of,broken,ships,filled,the,air,[END]
i,m,being,swept,out,into,the,bay,[END]
it,wouldn,t,be,as,bad,there,he,ought,to,be,able,to,make,shore,he,was,a,strong,swimmer,[END]
salladhor,saan,s,galleys,would,be,out,in,the,bay,as,well,ser,imry,had,commanded,them,to,stand,off,[END]
and,then,the,current,turned,him,about,again,and,davos,saw,what,awaited,him,downstream,[END]
the,chain,[END]
gods,save,us,they,ve,raised,the,chain,[END]
where,the,river,broadened,out,into,blackwater,bay,the,boom,stretched,taut,a,bare,two,or,three,feet,above,the,water,[END]
already,a,dozen,galleys,had,crashed,into,it,and,the,current,was,pushing,others,against,them,[END]
almost,all,were,aflame,and,the,rest,soon,would,be,[END]
davos,could,make,out,the,striped,hulls,of,salladhor,saan,s,ships,beyond,but,he,knew,he,would,never,reach,them,[END]
a,wall,of,red-hot,steel,blazing,wood,and,swirling,green,flame,stretched,before,him,[END]
the,mouth,of,the,blackwater,rush,had,turned,into,the,mouth,of,hell,[END]
tyrion,[END]
motionless,as,a,gargoyle,tyrion,lannister,hunched,on,one,knee,atop,a,merlon,[END]
beyond,the,mud,gate,and,the,desolation,that,had,once,been,the,fishmarket,and,wharves,the,river,itself,seemed,to,have,taken,fire,[END]
half,of,stannis,s,fleet,was,ablaze,along,with,most,of,joffrey,s,[END]
the,kiss,of,wildfire,turned,proud,ships,into,funeral,pyres,and,men,into,living,torches,[END]
the,air,was,full,of,smoke,and,arrows,and,screams,[END]
downstream,commoners,and,highborn,captains,alike,could,see,the,hot,green,death,swirling,toward,their,rafts,and,carracks,and,ferries,borne,on,the,current,of,the,blackwater,[END]
the,long,white,oars,of,the,myrish,galleys,flashed,like,the,legs,of,maddened,centipedes,as,they,fought,to,come,about,but,it,was,no,good,[END]
the,centipedes,had,no,place,to,run,[END]
a,dozen,great,fires,raged,under,the,city,walls,where,casks,of,burning,pitch,had,exploded,but,the,wildfire,reduced,them,to,no,more,than,candles,in,a,burning,house,their,orange,and,scarlet,pennons,fluttering,insignificantly,against,the,jade,holocaust,[END]
the,low,clouds,caught,the,color,of,the,burning,river,and,roofed,the,sky,in,shades,of,shifting,green,eerily,beautiful,[END]
a,terrible,beauty,[END]
like,dragonfire,[END]

a,man-at-arms,grabbed,the,bridle,of,his,horse,and,thrust,at,tyrion,s,face,with,a,dagger,[END]
he,knocked,the,blade,aside,and,buried,the,axe,in,the,nape,of,the,man,s,neck,[END]
as,he,was,wresting,it,free,a,blaze,of,white,appeared,at,the,edge,of,his,vision,[END]
tyrion,turned,thinking,to,find,ser,mandon,moore,beside,him,again,but,this,was,a,different,white,knight,[END]
ser,balon,swann,wore,the,same,armor,but,his,horse,trappings,bore,the,battling,black-and-white,swans,of,his,house,[END]
he,s,more,a,spotted,knight,than,a,white,one,tyrion,thought,inanely,[END]
every,bit,of,ser,balon,was,spattered,with,gore,and,smudged,by,smoke,[END]
he,raised,his,mace,to,point,downriver,[END]
bits,of,brain,and,bone,clung,to,its,head,[END]
my,lord,look,[END]
tyrion,swung,his,horse,about,to,peer,down,the,blackwater,[END]
the,current,still,flowed,black,and,strong,beneath,but,the,surface,was,a,roil,of,blood,and,flame,[END]
the,sky,was,red,and,orange,and,garish,green,[END]
what,he,said,[END]
then,he,saw,[END]
steel-clad,men-at-arms,were,clambering,off,a,broken,galley,that,had,smashed,into,a,pier,[END]
so,many,where,are,they,coming,from,[END]
squinting,into,the,smoke,and,glare,tyrion,followed,them,back,out,into,the,river,[END]
twenty,galleys,were,jammed,together,out,there,maybe,more,it,was,hard,to,count,[END]
their,oars,were,crossed,their,hulls,locked,together,with,grappling,lines,they,were,impaled,on,each,other,s,rams,tangled,in,webs,of,fallen,rigging,[END]
one,great,hulk,floated,hull,up,between,two,smaller,ships,[END]
wrecks,but,packed,so,closely,that,it,was,possible,to,leap,from,one,deck,to,the,other,and,so,cross,the,blackwater,[END]
hundreds,of,stannis,baratheon,s,boldest,were,doing,just,that,[END]
tyrion,saw,one,great,fool,of,a,knight,trying,to,ride,across,urging,a,terrified,horse,over,gunwales,and,oars,across,tilting,decks,slick,with,blood,and,crackling,with,green,fire,[END]
we,made,them,a,bloody,bridge,he,thought,in,dismay,[END]
parts,of,the,bridge,were,sinking,and,other,parts,were,afire,and,the,whole,thing,was,creaking,and,shifting,and,like,to,burst,asunder,at,any,moment,but,that,did,not,seem,to,stop,them,[END]
those,are,brave,men,he,told,ser,balon,in,admiration,[END]
let,s,go,kill,them,[END]
he,led,them,through,the,guttering,fires,and,the,soot,and,ash,of,the,riverfront,pounding,down,a,long,stone,quay,with,his,own,men,and,ser,balon,s,behind,him,[END]
ser,mandon,fell,in,with,them,his,shield,a,ragged,ruin,[END]
smoke,and,cinders,swirled,through,the,air,and,the,foe,broke,before,their,charge,throwing,themselves,back,into,the,water,knocking,over,other,men,as,they,fought,to,climb,up,[END]
the,foot,of,the,bridge,was,a,half-sunken,enemy,galley,with,dragonsbane,painted,on,her,prow,her,bottom,ripped,out,by,one,of,the,sunken,hulks,tyrion,had,placed,between,the,quays,[END]
a,spearman,wearing,the,red,crab,badge,of,house,celtigar,drove,the,point,of,his,weapon,up,through,the,chest,of,balon,swann,s,horse,before,he,could,dismount,spilling,the,knight,from,the,saddle,[END]
tyrion,hacked,at,the,man,s,head,as,he,flashed,by,and,by,then,it,was,too,late,to,rein,up,[END]
his,stallion,leapt,from,the,end,of,the,quay,and,over,a,splintered,gunwale,landing,with,a,splash,and,a,scream,in,ankle-deep,water,[END]

madness,followed,[END]
his,horse,had,broken,a,leg,and,was,screaming,horribly,[END]
somehow,he,managed,to,draw,his,dagger,and,slit,the,poor,creature,s,throat,[END]
the,blood,gushed,out,in,a,scarlet,fountain,drenching,his,arms,and,chest,[END]
he,found,his,feet,again,and,lurched,to,the,rail,and,then,he,was,fighting,staggering,and,splashing,across,crooked,decks,awash,with,water,[END]
men,came,at,him,[END]
some,he,killed,some,he,wounded,and,some,went,away,but,always,there,were,more,[END]
he,lost,his,knife,and,gained,a,broken,spear,he,could,not,have,said,how,[END]
he,clutched,it,and,stabbed,shrieking,curses,[END]
men,ran,from,him,and,he,ran,after,them,clambering,up,over,the,rail,to,the,next,ship,and,then,the,next,[END]
his,two,white,shadows,were,always,with,him,balon,swann,and,mandon,moore,beautiful,in,their,pale,plate,[END]
surrounded,by,a,circle,of,velaryon,spearmen,they,fought,back,to,back,they,made,battle,as,graceful,as,a,dance,[END]
his,own,killing,was,a,clumsy,thing,[END]
he,stabbed,one,man,in,the,kidney,when,his,back,was,turned,and,grabbed,another,by,the,leg,and,upended,him,into,the,river,[END]

a,naked,man,fell,from,the,sky,and,landed,on,the,deck,body,bursting,like,a,melon,dropped,from,a,tower,[END]

stones,began,to,plummet,down,crashing,through,the,decks,and,turning,men,to,pulp,until,the,whole,bridge,gave,a,shudder,and,twisted,violently,underfoot,knocking,him,sideways,[END]
suddenly,the,river,was,pouring,into,his,helm,[END]
he,ripped,it,off,and,crawled,along,the,listing,deck,until,the,water,was,only,neck,deep,[END]
a,groaning,filled,the,air,like,the,death,cries,of,some,enormous,beast,[END]

no,sooner,had,he,come,to,that,realization,than,he,heard,a,sudden,crack,loud,as,thunder,the,deck,lurched,beneath,him,and,he,slid,back,down,into,the,water,[END]

some,wore,stannis,s,flaming,heart,some,joffrey,s,stag-and-lion,some,other,badges,but,it,seemed,to,make,no,matter,[END]

on,one,side,of,him,was,a,raging,battle,a,great,confusion,of,bright,banners,waving,above,a,sea,of,struggling,men,shield,walls,forming,and,breaking,mounted,knights,cutting,through,the,press,dust,and,mud,and,blood,and,smoke,[END]

here,[END]

the,southern,sky,was,aswirl,with,glowing,shifting,colors,the,reflections,of,the,great,fires,that,burned,below,[END]

green,dawns,gave,way,to,orange,dusks,in,half,a,heartbeat,[END]
the,air,itself,smelled,burnt,the,way,a,soup,kettle,sometimes,smelled,if,it,was,left,on,the,fire,too,long,and,all,the,soup,boiled,away,[END]

sansa,backed,away,from,the,window,retreating,toward,the,safety,of,her,bed,[END]
i,ll,go,to,sleep,she,told,herself,and,when,i,wake,it,will,be,a,new,day,and,the,sky,will,be,blue,again,[END]
the,fighting,will,be,done,and,someone,will,tell,me,whether,i,m,to,live,or,die,[END]

once,for,blood,and,once,for,gold,and,once,for,love,[END]

could,pyat,pree,and,xaro,xhoan,daxos,be,the,second,and,the,third,[END]

child,of,three,they,had,called,her,daughter,of,death,slayer,of,lies,bride,of,fire,[END]
so,many,threes,[END]

enough,qhorin,said,abruptly,[END]
now,we,ride,[END]
ride,it,was,dark,beyond,the,fire,and,the,night,was,cold,[END]
ride,where,[END]
back,qhorin,mounted,his,weary,garron,one,more,time,[END]
the,fire,will,draw,them,past,i,hope,[END]
come,brother,[END]
jon,pulled,on,his,gloves,again,and,raised,his,hood,[END]
even,the,horses,seemed,reluctant,to,leave,the,fire,[END]
the,sun,was,long,gone,and,only,the,cold,silver,shine,of,the,half-moon,remained,to,light,their,way,over,the,treacherous,ground,that,lay,behind,them,[END]
he,did,not,know,what,qhorin,had,in,mind,but,perhaps,it,was,a,chance,[END]
he,hoped,so,[END]
i,do,not,want,to,play,the,oathbreaker,even,for,good,reason,[END]
they,went,cautiously,moving,as,silent,as,man,and,horse,could,move,retracing,their,steps,until,they,reached,the,mouth,of,a,narrow,defile,where,an,icy,little,stream,emerged,from,between,two,mountains,[END]
jon,remembered,the,place,[END]
they,had,watered,the,horses,here,before,the,sun,went,down,[END]
the,water,s,icing,up,qhorin,observed,as,he,turned,aside,else,we,d,ride,in,the,streambed,[END]
but,if,we,break,the,ice,they,are,like,to,see,[END]
keep,close,to,the,cliffs,[END]
there,s,a,crook,a,half,mile,on,that,will,hide,us,he,rode,into,the,defile,[END]
jon,gave,one,last,wistful,look,to,their,distant,fire,and,followed,[END]
the,farther,in,they,went,the,closer,the,cliffs,pressed,to,either,side,[END]
they,followed,the,moonlit,ribbon,of,stream,back,toward,its,source,[END]
icicles,bearded,its,stony,banks,but,jon,could,still,hear,the,sound,of,rushing,water,beneath,the,thin,hard,crust,[END]
a,great,jumble,of,fallen,rock,blocked,their,way,partway,up,where,a,section,of,the,cliff,face,had,fallen,but,the,surefooted,little,garrons,were,able,to,pick,their,way,through,[END]
beyond,the,walls,pinched,in,sharply,and,the,stream,led,them,to,the,foot,of,a,tall,twisting,waterfall,[END]
the,air,was,full,of,mist,like,the,breath,of,some,vast,cold,beast,[END]
the,tumbling,waters,shone,silver,in,the,moonlight,[END]
jon,looked,about,in,dismay,[END]
there,is,no,way,out,[END]
he,and,qhorin,might,be,able,to,climb,the,cliffs,but,not,with,the,horses,[END]
he,did,not,think,they,would,last,long,afoot,[END]
quickly,now,the,halfhand,commanded,[END]
the,big,man,on,the,small,horse,rode,over,the,ice-slick,stones,right,into,the,curtain,of,water,and,vanished,[END]
when,he,did,not,reappear,jon,put,his,heels,into,his,horse,and,went,after,[END]
his,garron,did,his,best,to,shy,away,[END]
the,falling,water,slapped,at,them,with,frozen,fists,and,the,shock,of,the,cold,seemed,to,stop,jon,s,breath,[END]
then,he,was,through,drenched,and,shivering,but,through,[END]
the,cleft,in,the,rock,was,barely,large,enough,for,man,and,horse,to,pass,but,beyond,the,walls,opened,up,and,the,floor,turned,to,soft,sand,[END]
jon,could,feel,the,spray,freezing,in,his,beard,[END]
ghost,burst,through,the,waterfall,in,an,angry,rush,shook,droplets,from,his,fur,sniffed,at,the,darkness,suspiciously,then,lifted,a,leg,against,one,rocky,wall,[END]
qhorin,had,already,dismounted,[END]
jon,did,the,same,[END]
you,knew,this,place,was,here,[END]
when,i,was,no,older,than,you,i,heard,a,brother,tell,how,he,followed,a,shadowcat,through,these,falls,he,unsaddled,his,horse,removed,her,bit,and,bridle,and,ran,his,fingers,through,her,shaggy,mane,[END]
there,is,a,way,through,the,heart,of,the,mountain,[END]
come,dawn,if,they,have,not,found,us,we,will,press,on,[END]
the,first,watch,is,mine,brother,qhorin,seated,himself,on,the,sand,his,back,to,a,wall,no,more,than,a,vague,black,shadow,in,the,gloom,of,the,cave,[END]
over,the,rush,of,falling,waters,jon,heard,a,soft,sound,of,steel,on,leather,that,could,only,mean,that,the,halfhand,had,drawn,his,sword,[END]
he,took,off,his,wet,cloak,but,it,was,too,cold,and,damp,here,to,strip,down,any,further,[END]
ghost,stretched,out,beside,him,and,licked,his,glove,before,curling,up,to,sleep,[END]
jon,was,grateful,for,his,warmth,[END]
he,wondered,if,the,fire,was,still,burning,outside,or,if,it,had,gone,out,by,now,[END]
if,the,wall,should,ever,fall,all,the,fires,will,go,out,[END]
the,moon,shone,through,the,curtain,of,falling,water,to,lay,a,shimmering,pale,stripe,across,the,sand,but,after,a,time,that,too,faded,and,went,dark,[END]
sleep,came,at,last,and,with,it,nightmares,[END]
he,dreamed,of,burning,castles,and,dead,men,rising,unquiet,from,their,graves,[END]
it,was,still,dark,when,qhorin,woke,him,[END]
while,the,halfhand,slept,jon,sat,with,his,back,to,the,cave,wall,listening,to,the,water,and,waiting,for,the,dawn,[END]

he,lit,the,first,one,now,and,led,the,way,down,into,the,dark,holding,the,pale,flame,up,before,him,[END]
jon,followed,with,the,horses,[END]
the,stony,path,twisted,and,turned,first,down,then,up,then,down,more,steeply,[END]
in,spots,it,grew,so,narrow,it,was,hard,to,convince,the,garrons,they,could,squeeze,through,[END]
by,the,time,we,come,out,we,will,have,lost,them,he,told,himself,as,they,went,[END]
not,even,an,eagle,can,see,through,solid,stone,[END]

yes,he,said,[END]

they,burned,qhorin,halfhand,where,he,d,fallen,on,a,pyre,made,of,pine,needles,brush,and,broken,branches,[END]

no,she,said,[END]

by,now,mance,is,well,down,the,milkwater,marching,on,your,wall,[END]
bran,[END]
the,ashes,fell,like,a,soft,grey,snow,[END]
he,padded,over,dry,needles,and,brown,leaves,to,the,edge,of,the,wood,where,the,pines,grew,thin,[END]
beyond,the,open,fields,he,could,see,the,great,piles,of,man-rock,stark,against,the,swirling,flames,[END]
the,wind,blew,hot,and,rich,with,the,smell,of,blood,and,burnt,meat,so,strong,he,began,to,slaver,[END]
yet,as,one,smell,drew,them,onward,others,warned,them,back,[END]
he,sniffed,at,the,drifting,smoke,[END]
men,many,men,many,horses,and,fire,fire,fire,[END]
no,smell,was,more,dangerous,not,even,the,hard,cold,smell,of,iron,the,stuff,of,man-claws,and,hardskin,[END]
the,smoke,and,ash,clouded,his,eyes,and,in,the,sky,he,saw,a,great,winged,snake,whose,roar,was,a,river,of,flame,[END]
he,bared,his,teeth,but,then,the,snake,was,gone,[END]
behind,the,cliffs,tall,fires,were,eating,up,the,stars,[END]
all,through,the,night,the,fires,crackled,and,once,there,was,a,great,roar,and,a,crash,that,made,the,earth,jump,under,his,feet,[END]
dogs,barked,and,whined,and,horses,screamed,in,terror,[END]
howls,shuddered,through,the,night,the,howls,of,the,man-pack,wails,of,fear,and,wild,shouts,laughter,and,screams,[END]
no,beast,was,as,noisy,as,man,[END]
he,pricked,up,his,ears,and,listened,and,his,brother,growled,at,every,sound,[END]
they,prowled,under,the,trees,as,a,piney,wind,blew,ashes,and,embers,through,the,sky,[END]
in,time,the,flames,began,to,dwindle,and,then,they,were,gone,[END]
the,sun,rose,grey,and,smoky,that,morning,[END]
only,then,did,he,leave,the,trees,stalking,slow,across,the,fields,[END]
his,brother,ran,with,him,drawn,to,the,smell,of,blood,and,death,[END]
they,padded,silent,through,the,dens,the,men,had,built,of,wood,and,grass,and,mud,[END]
many,and,more,were,burned,and,many,and,more,were,collapsed,others,stood,as,they,had,before,[END]
